Peñalolén is located in the east of the metropolitan area.  It has various attractions such as vineyards, buildings considered part of the cultural heritage, and excursions to natural areas, elements that are changing this town into a new tourism scene within the metropolitan region.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer, an electric razor, and scissors.

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is age 28 years. She is married and has three children between 10 months and 4 years old. None of her children attends school. 

Olive owns a boutique that she has been running for the past three years. 

With the loan she will buy more items such as sugar, salt and cooking oil. She expects to use the profits for savings. 

In the future, Olive dreams of owning a booming shop.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is a 28-year-old married woman. She has two children age 7 years and 11 years. She describes herself as loving and friendly. 

She operates a retail store where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located along a busy street and her customers are both repeat and new. 

She describes her biggest business challenge as insufficient funds. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more clothes. 

Her business goal is to run another clothes retail store within five years.

loans.use: To buy more clothes.

loans.name: Crispus Hamisi

texts.en:
Crispus Hamisi is a 39-year-old livestock seller in Mariakani. He is the married father of three. He has been selling livestock for the past two years successfully. 

This is Crispus’ third loan from KADET. He plans to buy more cows, goats and sheep to resell to his customers. 

He will use the proceeds to educate his children and repay his loan. He hopes to have a successful business.

loans.use: to buy more cows, goats and sheep

loans.name: Ada Zila

texts.es: Ada Zila es una emprendedora que lucha por salir adelante día a día  junto con sus hijos, esta emprendedora ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000 en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y con deseo de superación  en el negocio y en lo personal. Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios que es la mejor herencia que le dejara. Actualmente Ada Zila está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de pantalones para damas, caballeros, niños, blusa, cosméticos entre otros productos que demandan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ada Zila is an entrepreneur who fights to get ahead every day with her children.  This entrepreneur has had a loan already with Fundación León 2000, in which she has shown herself to be a responsible person with a desire to improve herself in business and personally.  Her biggest dream is that her children will finish their studies, which is the best legacy she will leave them.

Currently Ada Zila is requesting a loan to invest in her business by buying pants for women, men, and children; blouses; cosmetics; and other products that her customers request.

loans.use: to buy pants for women, men, and children; blouses; cosmetics; and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more palm kernel to produce more palm oil for sale.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en:
Ekua is married and has four children. Ekua sells kenkey (a dumpling-like food) and fried fish at Ankako. She has done this for six years. Her husband is a farmer.

Ekua will use the loan to buy more maize for the preparation of her kenkey and more fish for sale. 

With the new profits, Ekua hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more maize for the preparation of her kenkey and to buy more fish for sale.

loans.name: Alfonce

texts.en:
Alfonce is 60 years old and married, with seven children whose ages range from 15 years to 30 years old. He describes himself as focused. 

Alfonce operates a retail open air business where he sells posts. He has been involved in this business for ten years. His business is located in his village area and his primary customers are repeat and new. He describes his biggest business challenge to be low purchasing power from customers. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more posts. His business goal is to expand his post selling business within five years.

loans.use: To buy more posts for resale.

loans.name: Araba

texts.en:
Araba operates a grocery shop in Ankako. She is married and has six children. Her husband is a farmer.

Araba has been selling groceries for five years. She uses her income to assist her husband with paying their utility bills. Her loan will be used to purchase more groceries for resale at her shop. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to create awareness of, and to expand, her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries for resale at her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fried fish for resale.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha Lorena de 33 años de edad trabaja como docente de  secundaria desde hace 12 años,cuenta con el apoyo del padre de sus hijos, pues trabaja fuera de la ciudad y le envía dinero para los gastos del hogar, pues ambos desean para sus hijos una vida mejor.   Este credito lo requiere para compra de pintura y pintar la vivienda para que se mire bonita y tenga mayor durabilidad. Su mayor sueño en la vida es mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de su hogar que sus hijos gozen de salud y estudien para que sean personas de bien en la sociedad. segun referencias comerciales y personales es una joven muy responsable con muchos deseos de superaciòn profesional y laboral,
texts.en:
Martha Lorena, who is 33 years old, has worked as a middle school teacher for 12 years. She has the help of the father of her children, who works outside the city and sends her money for household expenses. Both hope for a better life for their children. 

She needs this loan to buy paint and to paint the house so that it looks nice and is more durable. Her greatest dream in life is to improve her living conditions and the conditions of her house, and that her children enjoy good health and study so they can be upstanding people of society. With commercial and personal references, she is a responsible young woman with the desire to get ahead professionally and in her work.

loans.use: to paint her house.

loans.name: Memuna

texts.en:
Memuna sells waakye (rice and beans cooked together) and she serves it with meat and fish stew in Ankako. She is married and has seven dependents. Her husband works at a gas filling station. 

Memuna has been selling waakye for 30 years. She uses her income to assist her husband with pay their housing bills. Her loan will be used to buy bags of rice, beans, fish, meat and other ingredients for the preparation of the waakye to be sold. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to set up a good and convenient place to sell.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, beans, fish, meat and other ingredients for the preparation of waakye to be sold.

loans.name: Nuris Esther

texts.es: Nuris con su credikiva compró pescado de mar al por mayor y ganó dinero porque manejó buenos precios, Sus ventas han mejorado y esto ayuda al aumento de su nivel de vida. En la actualidad está revisando la propuesta de administrar un restaurante y está evaluando su rentabilidad. Con su credikiva nuevo comprará pescado nuevamente al pormayor, para aumentar una vez mas su capital de trabajo y servir las delicias que ella prepara con este producto en su negocio. Su meta es seguir adelante y siempre sumar. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente:" Muchas bendiciones y que sigan apoyando a los microempresas de Colombia"
texts.en:
Nuris used her Kiva loan to buy ocean fish at wholesale and earned money because she managed good prices.  Her sales have improved and this has increased her living standard.  She’s currently looking over a proposal to open a restaurant and evaluating its profitability.

She will use her new Kiva loan to buy fish at wholesale again to increase her working capital once more and serve the delicious dishes she prepares with the fish in her business.  Her goal is to continue forward and to add always.  Her message to Kiva lenders is the following: “Many blessings and may you continue helping micro businesses in Colombia.”

loans.use: to buy fish at wholesale once more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags of flour and sugar to bake her bread for sale.

loans.name: Atta

texts.en: Atta is single parent and has one child. Atta is a hairdresser and owns a beauty salon in Ankako, which she has done for four years. Atta uses her income to feed herself and her child. Atta will use the loan to buy hair wigs and  hair creams for her beauty shop. With the new profits, Atta wishes to expand her salon.

loans.use: buy hair wigs and  hair creams

loans.name: Heisell Maria

texts.es: Heisell de 25 años de edad es casada, trabaja como responsable de sucursal de la Cruz Lorena. Solicita su 4to   crèdito para comprar material didactico y para pagar mensualidad de ella y de su esposo en la Universidad URACCAN, ademas desea ayudar a su hermana con los gastos de bachillerato. Esta joven pareja  ha sido muy responsable y bien trabajadores,han luchado juntos para obtener su propia vivienda. Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su esposo encuentre trabajo ya que ha quedado desempleado, culminar sus estudios universitarios y gozar de salud y que su familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Heisell, 25, is married and manages a Cruz Lorena branch office.  She’s asking for her 4th loan to buy school supplies and to pay her and her husband’s tuition at URACCAN University; she also wants to help with her sister’s high school costs.

This young couple has been very responsible and hardworking; they have striven together to obtain their own house.  Her greatest dream in life is that her husband finds employment since he is currently unemployed, to finish her university training, to enjoy good health and that her family stays together.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El señor  Roberto se dedica  a la administración de un baño publico de su propiedad, es cliente nuevo será la primera secuencia de su crédito,   es casado  y no tiene hijos que dependen  de el Sr.  Roberto vive en casa propia y su negocio   se encuentra en  el mismo domicilio es trabajador   ya que cuenta  con varios negocios el préstamo lo invertirá en la refacción de los baños ya que por constante uso se deteriora y realizar el mantenimiento de su negocio, el esta muy feliz de ser beneficiado ya que  se compromete en  pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, es una persona muy trabajadora se levanta muy temprano para realizar la limpieza de los baños,  se siente feliz por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Roberto runs public rest rooms that he owns. He’s a new client and this will be his first loan sequence.  He’s married and has no dependent children.  Roberto lives in his own house and his business is located there too.  He is a worker in that he has several businesses.  He will use the loan to repair the rest rooms which due to constant use wear down and to provide maintenance to his business.  He is very happy to be benefitted and he commits to make his installment payments punctually.  He is a very hardworking person who rises very early to clean the restrooms.  He feels happy for the support provided.

loans.use: to service and maintain his public rest rooms.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more palm fruit for the production of palm oil for sale

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El comité se denomina “Kuña Kyrey”, están en el Segundo Ciclo con 13  integrantes. Es un grupo conformado por personas muy unidas, solidarias y responsables. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, cuyo objetivo es poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y familiares. 
Maria es la presidenta del grupo, ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, que se esfuerza por darle lo mejor a su familia. Maria comenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de prendas, como ser camisas, remeras, pantalones y demás tipos, gracias a lo cual ella puede ayudar a su familia y cubrir los gastos que día a día surgen.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano para que de esa forma pueda surtirse y tener mayor variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee is called “Kuña Kyrey” and is in its second cycle with 13 members.  It’s a group composed of very united, supportive and responsible people.  They are hardworking, enterprising women whose objective is to move their children and families ahead.

María is the group President.  She defines herself as a hardworking, tenacious woman who strives to give the best to her family.  María comments that she sells all kinds of clothes like shirts, t-shirts, pants and others.  Thanks to this she’s able to help her family and cover daily costs that arise.

She asks for the loan to buy summer clothes so that she can be stocked up and have a wider variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more fish and cassava which she will use to prepare her kokontey for sale

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is divorced and has three children. She cooks banku, cooked fermented corn dough and cassava dough, for sale. She serves it with fried fish, pepper and tomatoes sauce at Ankako.  Ama has been doing this  for three months now. She is responsible for taking care of the family. Her loan will be used to buy bags of maize and fish which she uses in preparing her banku for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to mount a structure for the sale of her cooked banku and fish.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize and fish which she uses in preparing her banku for sale.

loans.name: Damaris Nohemi

texts.es:
Damaris de 25 años de edad, labora como asesora pedagogica, es una joven emprendedora y muy trabajadora  su esposo es comerciante y ademas se desempeña como conductor, ambos son bien trabajadores y bien unidos, pues comparten con los gastos familares y los deberes crediticios.  

Solicita financiamiento para pagar curso de titulaciòn y pago del titulo de la carrera Licenciatura en Ingles.  Su sueño es culminar sus estudios universitarios para despues estudiar un post grado y asi ir profesionalizandose, siempre y cuando cuente con la ayuda de su esposo el cual siempre le apoya.  

Cabe señalar que Damaris anteriormente fue beneficiada con kiva para la construccion de una habitacion en su casa por lo que les esta muy agradecida por la oportunidad que siempre brindan a las personas de escasos recursos, pues solo con los creditos es que podemos mejorar nuestras condiciones de vida y superarnos para que a nuestra familia tenga lo basico en la casa.
texts.en:
Damaris, 25, has worked for the Ministry of Education as a teaching assessor; she’s demonstrated responsibility and love for her daily work.  She’s a young hardworking, enterprising woman and her husband is a merchant who also works as a driver.  They are both very hardworking and united because they share household expenses and loan obligations.

She’s asking for a loan to pay her graduation and professional title costs for her Bachelor’s in English at Martín Lutero University.  Her dream is to complete her university training to then study a postgraduate course to increase her level of professionalism as long as she has her husband’s help who always supports her.

It’s worth mentioning that Damaris had a previous Kiva loan to build a room onto her house and she is very grateful for the opportunity they always give to people of scarce resources because it’s only with the loans that they can improve their living conditions and improve so that their families can have the basics at home.

loans.use: to pay for graduation and professional title costs.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua is married and has five children. Ekua  produces palm oil for sale at Ankako, which she has done for four years. Her husband is a carpenter. Ekua uses her income to support her husband in paying their children’s school fees. Ekua will use the loan to buy more palm fruit to produce more palm oil for sale. With the new profit, Ekua will expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more palm fruit to produce more palm oil for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to paint her house.

loans.name: Gladys Cecilia

texts.es: Gladys  desde muy joven veía a su madre coser y de ella aprendió mucho de lo que hoy sabe hacer, porque ella mediante estudio perfeccionó su arte específicamente en calado y bordado y actualmente definió su línea de confecciones en el plano infantil. Su mayor riqueza es su creatividad con la que diseña y trabaja los vestidos de niñas especialmente. Con su negocio ha logrado apoyar el bienestar de su hogar, conformado por su esposo y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 30 a 33 años. Su meta es seguir progresando y llegar a estructurar una unidad de negocios mas formalizada y con tecnología que genere empleo. Mientras esto ocurre trabaja diariamente con gran esfuerzo, dinamismo y alegría, obteniendo una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 38,5%, sus inventarios rotan cada 30 días y sus   cuentas por cobrar cada 12 días. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer financiamiento a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual comprará una fileteadora y materias primas e insumos de confección, para responde a su exigente clientela con el delicado acabado que solo ella puede ofrecer en su mercado.
texts.en:
From a very young age Gladys watched her mother sew and learned much of what she knows how to do today because through courses she perfected her art especially in openwork and embroidery.  She has defined her line specifically in infant ware.  Her greatest gift is her creativity with which she designs and manufactures dresses for little girls, especially.

With her business she has managed to support her home’s wellbeing; it is composed of her husband and three children whose ages range between 30 and 33.  Her goal is to continue making progress to reach a more formalized business structure with technology that will create jobs.  While this happens, however, she works daily with much effort, dynamism and joy obtaining a profit margin of no less than 38.5% and a 30-day stock turnover rate; her accounts receivable are 12 days.

She is currently applying for her first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she’ll use to buy a serger sewing machine, raw materials and sewing supplies to respond to her demanding clientele with the delicate finishing touches that only she provides in her market.

loans.use: to buy serger sewing machine, raw materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Jorge Antonio es soltero, tiene 20 años de edad, es perito contador diplomado, se dedica a la sastrería, a la confección de camisas y pantalones, inició  este negocio como operario y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas  e hilos, de diferentes clases y colores para mejorar su producción de tejidos, ya que espera tener un negocio con mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Jorge Antonio, 20, is single and a certified accounting expert.  He works as a tailor; he makes shirts and pants.  He started in this business as an employee and to date has five years’ experience.  He’s asking for a loan to buy fabric and thread of various kinds and colors to improve his production of textiles since he hopes to have a more profitable business.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Libertadores Group

texts.es: Un grupo con mucho optimismo y deseo de hacer negocio, es el grupo Libertadores, formado hace ya dos años, cuenta con 7 integrantes los cuales dan fe que si se puede salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades. Muestra de ello es la señora Maria de 57 años de edad, casada y con 7 hijos de los cuales  seis son independientes y uno aun esta a su cuidado, ella se dedica a la venta de tuberculos en un puesto en el mercado de su zona hace 40 años, Este negocio que le ha dado muchas satisfacciones como son la implementación de muebles en el hogar y los estudios de sus hijos. con el reciente préstamo la señora Maria lo invertirá en comprar de mas tuberculos y así poder tener mayores ingresos y estabilidad económica en cuanto a los gastos del hogar. No puedo concluir sin antes mencionar el desempeño y el entusiasmo de cada integrante de  los Libertadores para llegar a un objetivo en común el cual es la estabilidad económica para sus familias y el progreso de sus negocios.
texts.en:
One very optimistic group, with a desire to do business, is the Libertadores ("Liberators").  Formed two years ago, it consists of seven members who have faith that one can succeed in spite of adversity.  

An example of that, Maria is 57 years old, married with seven children, six of whom are independent and one of whom remains in Maria's care.  For 40 years, Maria has worked selling tubers (a type of plant) in a stall in the market in her area.  This business has given her a lot of satisfaction, as it has provided for the furniture in her home and the schooling of her children.  

With this loan, Maria will invest it in her business and purchase more tubers.  This will allow her to increase her income and provide greater financial stability as to her household expenses.  

I cannot conclude without mentioning the hard work and enthusiasm of each member of the Libertadores in achieving their common goals, which are financial stability for their families and the success of their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase tubers (a type of plant).

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde de 62 años,  vive en  el municipio de Soledad y tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 33 y 36 años respectivamente. Allí mismo tiene un negocio, a través del cual se dedica a la venta de mercancías variada y medicinas naturales, entre otros artículos que sus clientes le encargan y ella se los consigue,  para que estos, en la  comodidad de sus posibilidades económicas le paguen a plazos pactados. Su negocio surgió cuando se separó de su esposo y debió buscar oportunidades de ingresos,  para que su familia avanzara y tuvieran todos  bienestar. Su meta es lograr el crecimiento de su negocio, para continuar con la satisfacción de sus necesidades personales y convertir su negocio en una miscelánea, donde sus clientes, tan pronto lleguen identifiquen lo que les hace falta y le compren rápidamente, porque su propósito es minimizar la venta en la calle y salirle al paso a la competencia,  que cada día se muestra con promociones exhibidas. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará omega 3, lociones, perfumes propolio etc, artículos que basa en los pedidos de sus compradores y que aparecen en el mercado, con importantes  descuentos en ésta época de un nuevo año 2012.
texts.en:
Matilde is 62 years old, lives in the town of Soledad, and has two children aged 33 and 36 years old.  She has a business, through which she sells various merchandise and herbal medicines, among other items that her clients request and that she acquires on their behalf.  Due to the limited resources of her customers, they pay her over time according to set schedules.

Matilde's business increased when she separated from her husband and had to look for earning opportunities to provide for her family and allow it to advance.  Her goal is to grow her business, so as to continue satisfying her personal expenses, and to convert her business into a general store where her customers could, upon arriving, identify what they need and purchase it quickly.  She hopes to minimize street sales and outlast the competition, which displays promotions every day.  

She is applying for her first KIVA loan, through the Foundation Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy omega-3, lotions, perfumes, propolis (a resin with medicinal uses), and other products that are requested by her customers and appear in the market, with important discounts in this new year of 2012.

loans.use: to buy omega 3, lotions, perfumes, propolis, and natural medicines.

loans.name: Vidalia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Vidalia de 43 años de edad,  trabaja como docente de primaria  en la Escuela Rafaela Herrera desde hace 26 años,   cuenta con el apoyo economico de su compañero de vida  que trabaja como albañil y le ayuda  con los gastos familiares, segun referencias es muy responsable, Humilde y de buen vivir en su comunidad. solicita su  7mo  crèdito para terminar  de construir una habitaciòn y asi tener mejores condiciones en su hogar y darle mas valor a su propiedad.  su mayor sueño en la vida es que familia permanezca en los caminos de Dios y gozar de salu d y trabajo.
texts.en: Vidalia is 43 years old. For the past 26 years she has worked as a primary teacher in the Rafaela Herrera school. She has the economic support of her life partner, who works as mason and helps with the family's expenses. According to references she is very responsible, humble and has a good reputation in the community. She is requesting a seven month loan to finish the construction of a bedroom. This will improve the living conditions in her home and increase the property value. Her biggest dream in life is for her family to remain in the way of the Lord and enjoy good health and work.

loans.use: to finish building a room

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: Evaristo, de 43 años, esta casado con Aurea de 37 años y tienen 04 hijos y cuentan con su propia casa donde ronda la felicidad. Desde muy niño sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, hoy es campesino y cuenta con un terreno donde cultiva plantas de cacao. Viene trabajando 15 años en sus propias tierras, En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de los jornaleros para  así avanzar con mayor  rapidez con las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos y frutos de piña. Su dificultad es no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas; es por ello que acude a los préstamos que facilita la Institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con 01 hectárea de terreno no cultivado. Este será el crédito número 01 con MFP, siente que el dinero del crédito le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy querido por el resto de sus compañeros, ya que es muy solidario con ellos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles; comprará plantas de cacao para amplir la producción.
texts.en: Evaristo is 43 years old, he is married to Aurea, who is 37 years old. Together they have 4 children. They have their own house where they live happily. Since he was a child his parents taught him to work on the farm, now he is a farmer and he has his own land where he grows cocoa trees. He has been working his own land for the past 15 years. During harvest times he has help from his children and other hired laborers to be able to pick the fruit more quickly. What he likes most about his work is harvesting his plants because he can see that his months of hard work have resulted in the reward of good fruit. The hardest thing is to transport his products from the farm to the warehouse that is located in the city of San Francisco; this is where he is able to get the best price for his grains and pineapples. His difficulty is that he does not have enough economic income to be able to cover the advance payments to the hired laborers that help him during the harvest. It is for this reason that he came to the institution of MFP. But right now what is of higher priority is to plant more cocoa trees in a hectare of uncultivated land that he has. This will be his first loan with MFP. Evaristo feels that the money from this loan will help him greatly in the progress of his work. In his community bank he is a member that is very well liked by the rest of the members; he is well integrated with them. With the loan of 1,500 nuevos soles he is going to buy cocoa trees, which will increase his production.

loans.use: to buy cocoa plants

loans.name: Evelyne

texts.en:
Evelyne is 27 years old. She is married and has three children. One of her children attends school. 

Evelyne sells sportswear garments and has been running this business for four years. With the loan she will buy more sports garments to sell. 

She plans to use the profits to pay school fees for her child. Evelyne dreams of having a sports garments store in the future.

loans.use: to buy more sports garments to sell.

loans.name: Zoila Rosa

texts.es: Zoila de 24 años fue educada por su madre con mucha responsabilidad y valores morales en los que enmarca su vida, pues al quedar huérfana vio como su madre los sacó adelante y la llevó a lograr su licenciatura en matemáticas. Zoila contrajo matrimonio  en el año 2009 con su novio licenciado en idiomas, y trabajan mediante contratos profesionales en instituciones educativas, además de ser los propietarios de una panadería ubicada al suroccidente de la ciudad de Barranquilla, negocio que crearon para fortalecer los ingresos y planear su futuro con mayor éxito. En la actualidad está planeando Zoila acceder a un credikiva con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos como harina, queso, huevos en mayores proporciones y de contado, con el cual planean incrementar su capital de trabajo y ganar descuentos por las características de su compra lo que supone una inversión muy exitosa, porque conocen muy bien su negocio y gozan de la aceptación y del cariño de su clientela ubicada a sus alrededores y que en general son tiendas ubicadas en diversos barrios del sector.
texts.en:
Zoila, age 24, was raised by her mother with much responsibility and the moral values that have defined her life.  Upon becoming motherless she saw how her mother got them ahead and led her to obtain her degree in mathematics.

Zoila married her fiancé in the year 2009.  He has a degree in languages, and they work through professional contracts at educational institutions.  They are also the owners of a bakery in the southwestern part of the city of Barranquilla.  They created this business to enhance their income and to plan their future with greater success.

Zoila is currently planning to get a Kiva loan.  She will use the loan to buy raw materials and supplies like flour, cheese and eggs.  She will buy in greater quantities and for cash.  She plans to increase her working capital and to get discounts for the terms of her purchases.  She imagines that the investment will be very successful because they know their business very well.  They enjoy the recognition and affection of their customers in the surrounding areas.  Generally speaking there are stores in the different neighborhoods of the sector.

loans.use: to buy supplies like flour, cheese, and eggs in greater quantities for cash.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 24 years old, married, and has one child who is two and a half years old. Her husband works as a businessman. 

Rebecca has been selling clothes for the past three years. She has requested the loan to buy more clothes to sell. 

With the profits, she plans to start saving for her child’s education.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Melinda 	Rocio

texts.es: La señorita Melinda es una joven emprendedora que se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir,  que vive con sus 2 hermanos y su madre a quienes s ayuda con los gastos del hogar, ya que esta es su única actividad para poder ayudar en la economía de su hogar,  ella se dedica a la confección de  vestidos para niñas y para mayores hace ya 2 años, con el crédito tiene pensado comprar telas, cintas, encajes y para poder realizar unos  trabajo para las oficinas ya que tiene muchos pedidos por esta temporada y así poder aumentar su capital y sus ingresos de su familia, con el tiempo ampliar su negocio y culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Señorita Melinda is a young entrepreneur, who works making clothing items.  She lives with her two brothers and her mother, whom she helps with the household expenses.  This is her only activity that allows her to help with the household finances.

She has been working sewing clothes for children and for adults for the last two years.  With the loan she intends to purchase fabric, ribbons and lace, so that she can do some work for the offices from which she gets many orders at this time of year.  In this way she can increase her capital and her family's income, and with time she can expand her business and complete her studies.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making clothing: fabric and thread

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en:
Esperance is 31 years old. She has four children between the ages of nine months and 13 years. 

Esperance has been making clothes for the past three years. She is a tailor. 

With the loan, she will buy more fabrics and thread for making clothes. She plans to use the profits for making savings.

loans.use: to buy more fabrics and thread so she can make more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay college fees to pursue further studies.

loans.name: Lilian Ruth

texts.es: La Sra. Lilian esta sacando otro credito con la institucion, ella tiene como actividad la atención de un Salón de belleza indica que  tiene experiencia de 5 años en esta actividad su salón se encuentra en la zona Oquendo donde realiza distintos tipos de trabajos como ser cortes de cabello, bases, tintes, manicure, pedicura y otros; vive en casa familiar su domicilio se encuentra en el noroeste de la ciudad de Cochabamba en la zona Hipódromo; tiene 2 hijos su esposo es transportista la señora indica  que con su actividad genera ingresos para su familia para el estudio y manutención; el dinero que se le otorga es para la compra de productos cosméticos y mejoramiento de los ambientes de su peluquería, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado, ya que gracias a la institución creció en su actividad.
texts.en:
Señora Lilian is looking for another loan from this financial institution.  Her business is running a beauty salon.  She indicates that she has five years of experience in this activity.  Her salon is located in the Oquendo area, where she she undertakes various types of work such as hair cuts, styling, color, manicures, pedicures, and other things.

She lives in the family home, which is located to the north-east of the city of Cochabamba, in the Hipódromo area.  She has 2 children and her husband is a trucker. She states that her business generates income to support her family and for education.  

The money being provided to her is for the purchase of cosmetic products and for improving her beauty salon . 

She is grateful to the lending institution for the help provided, as thanks to this institution she has been able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products and make improvements in her beauty salon.

loans.name: Sia Agatha's Group

texts.en:
We introduce to you in the photo above teachers of a primary school situated in Koidu/Kono, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. Like their teacher colleagues in other regions of the country, they have requested a loan of 6,500,000 Sierra Leonean Leones from Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, which is in northern Sierra Leone. With this loan, they will be able to meet their immediate financial challenges. At the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries. 

The leader of this group of teachers is Sia, who was born in Seidu Nimikoro in eastern Sierra Leone. The 45 year old is married to a teacher, and the couple has four children together.  Two are in secondary school and two are in primary school. With 25 years of experience in the teaching profession, Sia is requesting this loan in order to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Desmond Massuba's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni,  is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from Koidu, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 5,600,000 SLL in order to meet their immediate financial challenges. At the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries.

Desmond is the leader of this group of teachers. Desmond was born in Jaima Sewafeh in eastern Sierra Leone. He is fifty-six years old and married to a nurse. The couple has three children together. Two are in college and the other is not of school-going age. Desmond has been a teacher for twenty-seven years. He has requested this loan in order to pay college fees both for his children and for himself in order to pursue further studies.

loans.use: to pay college fees both for his children and for himself to pursue further studies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house building materials for the construction of a family house.

loans.name: Marie Solange

texts.en: Marie Solange is 24. She is married with three children aged between one month and six years. The oldest child attends school. She wants a loan to buy equipment for her salon, such as shampoo, dryers and mirrors. Marie Solange has spent three years running this business. With the profits, she will renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more salon equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy starch, cheese, lard, anise, and other ingredients.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José de 66 años de edad ofrece servicios electrónicos en  vehículos  de mantenimiento y reparación. Él desarrolló su  experiencia de trabajo como auxiliar de mecánica y electromecánica, durante 6 años, porque  fue empleado de  una empresa, de donde nació su propio negocio,  quedó cesante y decidió dedicarse manera independiente a ello. Su negocio funciona en un espacio subarrendado  de un parqueadero en un punto de gran concurrencia vehicular; él se ha hecho muy conocido por los propietarios de vehículos que guardan sus vehículos mientras trabajan o hacen diligencias en el centro de la ciudad, la zona mas concurrida comicialmente de Barranquilla.
Con sus ingresos genera bienestar a sus hijos y apoya a su familia también y esto para él es muy importante. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará repuestos y algunas herramientas como tester, y extensiones eléctricas, muy necesarias para su buen desempeño, con lo que ofrecerá un mejor servicio a sus clientes. El maneja una rentabilidad sobre sus ventas no menor del 42% y con sus créditos planea aumentarla, comprando de contado y buscando el incremento de su clientela a quien atiende con muchos deseos de ofrecerle la solución que ellos requieren.
texts.en:
José, who is 66 years old, offers electronic services for vehicle maintenance and repairs.  He developed his job experience as a mechanic and elecromechanic's assistant.  He was employed by a company for 6 years, from which his own company was born.  He lost his job and decided to do the job independently.  His business functions in a sublet space in a parking lot where there is great vehicular traffic.  He has become very well known by the car owners that keep their cars in the area while they work or that run errands in the center of the city, Barranquilla's most crowded commercial zone.  

With his income, he provides wellbeing for his children, and he supports his family as well.  For him, this is very important.  He is currently applying for his first Kiva loan, the first loan that Fundación Mario Santo Domingo is making.  With the loan, he will buy spare parts and some tools that are very necessary for his good performance such as a [battery] tester and extension cords.  He will offer better service to his customers with these items.  He earns a profit above his costs that is no less that 42%.  He plans to increase his profits with the loan by paying cash and looking to increase the number of customers that he serves with high desires of offering them the solution that they need.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and some tools like a [battery] tester and extension cords.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy building materials for the construction of a family house.

loans.name: Domithile

texts.en: Domithile is 40 years old. She has five children, three of whom are enrolled in school. Domithile sells food products, and she has been running this business for seven years. She has requested a loan to buy items such as beans and sorghum to sell. She plans to save the profits. In the future, Domithile would like to own a store.

loans.use: to buy additional food items to sell.

loans.name: Ernestine

texts.en: Ernestine is 47 years old. She has five children aged between eight and twenty. Four of them attend school. Her husband works as a farmer. Ernestine has been selling clothes for the past three years. She has requested a loan to buy more clothes to sell. She will save the profits. In the future, she would like to have a market stall in the city.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.es: El sr. Jhonny vive en la zona norte de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  vive en la  casa de sus padres con su familia que integra de sus dos hijos ya que esta separada de la esposa que por cuestión de trabajo esta de viaje el Sr.  tiene un taller de carpintería el tiene su taller  hace mas de 2 años y hasta la fecha le va muy bien,  no tiene crédito alguno en ninguna institución financiera, en este momento solicita el préstamo para la compra de madera ya que para fin de año tiene pensado exponer sus muebles en el taller que tiene un pequeña tienda motivo por el cual se solicita el financiamiento para la compra de madera para la fabricación de estos muebles, el sr. Jhonny es una persona muy trabajadora y muy amable, con el futuro desea poder tener una tienda mas grande y poder vender sus muebles a distintas ciudades y poder entregar por mayor según pedidos.
texts.en:
Jhonny lives in the north area of the city of Cochabamba. He lives in his parents' house, with his family, which consists of his two sons, as he is living apart from his wife, who is away due to work. 

He has a carpentry workshop, which he has had for more than two years, and up to now, it has gone very well for him. 

He has not had a loan with any financial institution. At this time, he is applying for a loan to purchase wood, as by the end of the year, he is planning to display his furniture at his workshop, which has a small store area. For this reason, he is applying for the loan to buy wood for making this furniture. 

Jhonny is a very hard-working person and very friendly. In the future he wishes to have a larger store, sell his furniture in various cities, and be able to fill wholesale orders.

loans.use: To buy equipment and wood.

loans.name: Jose Marcelino

texts.es:
José, vive junto a su esposa y su hija en casa propia, él se dedica hace tres años a su negocio de panadería elaborando pan dulce y francés, aprendió en una panadería y ahora su negocio es propio, trabaja todos los días de lunes  a domingo.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una batidora para el pan y otros materiales como: harina, levadura, azúcar teniendo toda la materia prima podrá obtener mejor produccion y las ganancias serán mejores cada día.
El sueño de José es mantener su negocio estable y con el tiempo tener una panadería grande y en lo personal quiere satisfacer las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and daughter in their own house.  He has worked in his bakery business for three years, making sweet bread and French bread. He learned his trade in a bakery, and now has his own business. He works every day from Monday to Sunday. 

He needs the loan to buy a mixer for the bread, and ingredients such as flour, yeast, and sugar. By having all the raw materials, he will be able to produce more, and the earnings will be better every day. 

José's dream is to keep his business going, and in time to have a large bakery. On the personal side, he wants to meet his family's needs.

loans.use: To buy a mixer, flour, yeast, and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials like corrugated sheets, bags of cement, rods, nails, etc. for the construction of a family house

loans.name: Theresa Kumba's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are a group of teachers from the eastern city of Koidu/Kono. They have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva based in Makeni city, in northern Sierra Leone to apply for a loan of 7,800,000.00 SLL. With the help of this loan, they will be able to solve their immediate financial needs and then gradually repay the loan, using their monthly salaries.

Theresa is the leader of this group of teachers.  Born in Koidu city, in eastern Sierra Leone, the fifty-two-year-old is married and has five children who are in college. Theresa has been a professional teacher for twenty-two years. She has applied for this loan in order to pay college fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay college fees for her children

loans.name: San Marcos Group

texts.es:
San Marcos” fue denominado el comité y actualmente se encuentran en el 6º ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya, con  11 integrantes. Son señoras muy activas y reconocidas en el barrio por el trabajo en equipo y por la unión.
La Sra Julia es una de las señoras que plenamente se dedica a su trabajo para cumplir con sus obligaciones su actividad de todos los días se basa en tejer colchas en su propia casa y por medio de este trabajo ha logrado mantener a su familia. Ella nos dice que todo lo que hace es por darle un estilo de vida diferente a todos los suyos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compras de hilos, agujas, colorantes y demás, los cuales siempre utiliza para sus tejidos. Ella cuenta que ve en Kiva y fundación paraguaya una gran oportunidad para poder progresar.
texts.en:
The “San Marcos” communal bank, with 11 members, is currently in its 6th loan cycle with the Fundación Paraguaya’s Program for Enterprising Women. The members of this bank are very active women, well known in the neighborhood for their unity and team work. Sra. Julia is a member who is fully dedicated to her work and to meeting her obligations. She spends every day weaving bedspreads in her home and has succeeded in supporting her family with this work. She tells us that everything she does is to provide a different life style for them.

Julia is requesting a loan to purchase yarn, needles, dyes and other items that she always uses in her woven goods. She explains that she sees in KIVA and Fundación Paraguaya a great opportunity for her to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase yarn, needles, dyes and other supplies for her weaving.

loans.name: Tamba Joseph's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is a group of teachers from the eastern city of Koidu/Kono. They have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva based in Makeni city, in northern Sierra Leone, to apply for a loan of 7,000,000.00 SLL. With the help of this loan, they will be able to solve their immediate financial needs and then gradually repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. 

Their leader is Tamba.  Born in Njagbwema Fiama, in eastern Sierra Leone, the fifty-three-year-old is married and has seven children – two in primary school, three in secondary school and two grownups. Tamba has been a professional teacher for twenty-eight years. He has applied for this loan in order to buy corrugated metal sheets to roof his house.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheets to roof his house

loans.name: Maria Dominga

texts.es:
María, tiene 39 años de edad vive con su esposo y dos hijos en casa familiar, ella tiene una granja de pollos de engorde hace 4 años el oficio lo aprendió de su suegra el cual le dedica todo el tiempo completo, por eso no tiene un horario establecido.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar pollos de un día de nacidos para engordarlos y concentrado para su alimentación, vacunas contra alguna enfermedad, de esa forma el negocio estará en buenas condiciones y podrá obtener en un futuro las ganancias necesarias para el sostenimiento de su familia.
La aspiración de María es que sus hijos estudien y sean independientes, tener vivienda propia y aumentar en la granja de pollos para que sus ganancias sean mejores.
texts.en:
María is 39 and lives with her husband and two children in the familial home. She has had a chicken farm raising broilers for 4 years. She learned the task from her mother-in-law and devotes full-time to it so she does not have a set schedule.

She will utilize the loan to buy day-old chicks to fatten as well as concentrate for feeding and vaccines against disease. In this way her business will be on solid ground and she will be able to make the necessary profit to support her family in the future.

María’s aspirations are for her children to get an education and become independent, to have her own residence and to expand her chicken farm in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy day-old chicks, concentrate and vaccines.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 30 years old. She has owned a food stall for the past year. She wants the loan to buy more foodstuffs such as sugar and rice to sell. She will use the profits to renovate her house. In the future, Josephine dreams to own a shop.

loans.use: To buy more food to sell.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.es: Jesusa, de 54 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Hugo de 37 años y fruto de ese amor concibieron 01 hija Ruth de 20 años, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los arduos trabajos que realiza Jesusa junto a su pareja en su chacra, han hecho que sus cultivos estén muy bien cuidados y que los días de venta sus productos sean rápidamente comprados. Su principal fuente de ingreso, es la venta de cacao, teniendo en total 06 cuadras de terreno. Los frutos de sus plantas los vende en la ciudad de San Francisco y en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros y de esa manera avanza con mayor celeridad en las extracciones de sus frutos. Llleva 45 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que atacan sin piedad los primeros brotes de sus cultivos, es por ello que con el crédito solicitado comprará insecticidas para combatir la plaga. Con el tiempo, desea adquirir nuevas tierras, para ampliar sus cultivos. Este será el crédito número 06 con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y trabaja sin causar problemas a su banco comunal. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles; comprará plantas de cacao para incrementar en su parcela.
texts.en:
Jesusa is 54 years old. She is a happy and hardworking woman. She lives in her own house with her husband for 37 years, Hugo, and from the fruit of that love was conceived a daughter, Ruth who is 20 years old and she wants to provide her with a better quality of life.

Jesusa works hard in the field with her husband, and they have cultivated crops that are well cared for, and their crops are bought quickly on sales days.

Her main source of income is the sale of cocoa, and she has a total of about 9 acres of land. The fruit of her plants are sold in the city of San Francisco and during harvest time they contract laborers and in this way they can advance quickly while harvesting the fruit.

She has been doing this work for 45 years and she considers the most difficult thing about it is to keep the pests away from her crops that attack without pity the first shoots of her crops. This is why she is asking for a loan to buy insecticides to fight the pests. Over time, she wants to procure new land in order to increase her crops. 

This will be her 6th loan through MFP. She has been very punctual in her previous loans and she works without causing problems in the communal bank. 

With the 3,000 soles she will buy cocoa plants to grow on her land.

loans.use: to buy cocoa plants

loans.name: Felicitee

texts.en: Felicitee is 50 years old. She is married to a businessman. She has 4 children between the ages of 22 and 32 — all of them married. She has run a stall for the past two years. Felicitee has requested the loan to buy items such as soaps; cooking oil and flour to sell. With the profits she plans to make savings. In the future, Felicitee plans to have a shop.

loans.use: To buy more shop items for sell.

loans.name: Alcira Isabel

texts.es: Alcira está preparándose para recibir un nuevo credikiva y está muy satisfecha, porque compró de contado materias primas e insumos para fabricar nuevos diseños. Su nuevo crédito, lo invertirá en la compra de telas, e hilos al por mayor con ello logrará aumentar aun mas su producción y optimizar los costos generando mayores ganancias y este es justamente su plan. Su mensaje a los financiadores der Kiva es el siguiente: “les agradezco de todo corazón la ayuda prestada que me han brindado y espero me sigan apoyando. “
texts.en: Alcira is preparing to receive a new Kiva loan and is very happy because she bought on installment the basic materials and supplies in order to make new designs. The new loan will be used to buy fabric and thread at wholesale price with which she can successfully increase her production and maximize value and generate higher earnings and this is her exact plan. Her message to the Kiva funders is as follows, “I thank them with all my heart for the help given to me and I hope that they continue to support me.”

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Sylvie

texts.en: Sylvie, age 36, is married to a carpenter. They have seven children and all of them go to school. Sylvie has been selling sorghum for one and a half years. She has requested this loan to buy more sorghum to sell. Sylvie is planning to use the profits that will be obtained from the business for savings.

loans.use: to buy more sorghum to sell.

loans.name: San Roque Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado San Roque es de la ciudad de Concepción, cuenta con diez y siete integrantes  en donde todas tienen una pequeña activada a la cual se dedique por mas pequeña que sea  las señoras se sienten muy emocionadas, la ayuda mutua entre ellas es constante y por sobre todo las inspira las ganas de seguir luchando por sus familias.
Mercedes en una mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas, y nos comenta que al principio empezó desde muy abajo, es decir, solo hacia ventas pequeñas, pero después fue creciendo y ahora ya tiene una clientela bien definida. Su meta es seguir trabajando de la misma forma en lo ha estado haciendo para poder seguir creciendo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, como ser bermudas, camisillas, vestidos, soleritas y demás prendas, con las cuales podrá surtirse.
texts.en:
The San Roque committee has seventeen members in the city of Concepción and all have a small business.  Despite being small businesses the women are very excited about them and help each other.  They are persevering and inspire the others to continue struggling for their families.

Mercedes is a hardworking and entrepreneurial woman who sells clothing.  She tells us that she started very small with only a few sales but then it began growing and now she has a good customer base.  Her goal is to continue working in the same way that she has been doing to be able to continue expanding.
She requests a loan to supply her business with summer clothing such as Bermuda shorts, shirts, dresses, skirts, and other clothing.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing to sell later

loans.name: Ruth Maria

texts.es: Ruth emprendió su negocio fundamentada en la experiencia que adquirió con su sobrino; esto la llevó a tener sus ingresos independientes con los cuales ha sostenido su hogar hoy conformado por ella y sus dos hijos en las edades de 27 y 28 años. La venta de comidas,  es tradicional en su familia y el arte de la preparación de comidas rápidas le pareció a Ruth,  muy útil y rentable además de práctico para replicarlo. Ella vende en las horas de la noche y especialmente los días festivos,  momentos en los cuales se incrementan sus ventas. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, también primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará embutidos, salsa, veduras y un horno microondas; entre   sus deliciosos productos, se encuentran las hamburguesas, los perros calientes, salchipapas y combinaciones que ella misma ha inventado con el propósito de que agrade a su clientela y lograr con ello fidelizarla.
texts.en: Ruth undertook her primary business after gaining experience with her nephew. She learned how to keep her earnings separate from the ones that sustain her household. Her household is comprised of her two children, ages 27 and 28, and herself. Selling prepared food is a tradition in her family. The art of preparing food quickly is very useful and profitable for Ruth. With practice she is able to do it better. She sells prepared food in the evening and on festival days. On these days she can increase her sales. She is actually applying for her first loan with KIVA. This is also her first loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. With this loan she will buy sausages, salsa, vegetables and a microwave oven. Among the delicious food she prepares are hamburgers, hot dogs, potato chips and food items that she invented with the help of her loyal customers.

loans.use: to buy sausages, salsa, vegetables and a microwave oven.

loans.name: Carlos Orlando

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 18 y 23 años de edad, es empleado y además atiende una granja de cerdos, su trabajo es en la alcaldía municipal, como barrendero, el horario es de 4:00am a 12:00md, todos los días de lunes a viernes, los fines de semana se dedica a atender la granja y durante la semana después de su trabajo.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 3 terneros, para la crianza, ya que tiene la oferta de venta y le ayudara para aumentar la granja. Este préstamo le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio y que su familia este más segura de esta actividad económica; La aspiración de Carlos es que sus hijos estudien, poco a poco ir apoyándoles para que salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his wife and two children who are 18 and 23 years old.  He is employed and also attends to a pig farm.  His job is in the local mayor's office as a janitor.  His schedule is from 4 am to 12 noon, Monday through Friday.  On the weekends, and during the week after his job, he attends to the farm.
He is currently asking for a loan to purchase three new calves to raise, since he already has a sales offer.  It will help him to grow the farm.  This loan will help him to strengthen his business.  This economic activity will also help his family to be more secure.  Carlos' dream is that his children study.  Little by little he continues to support them so that they move ahead.

loans.use: to buy three calves.

loans.name: Patricie

texts.en: Patricie is 54 years old. She is a widow with 15 children. Three of them go to school and the others don’t attend school due to financial problems. She sells sorghum, which she has been doing for the past 5 years. With this loan, she will buy more sorghum to sell. She plans to use the profits to buy home domestic products. In the future, she dreams of having a stock of foodstuffs.

loans.use: to buy sorghum

loans.name: Prudencio

texts.es: Prudencio, de 44 años de edad, vive separado de su pareja, tiene 02 hijos Yuri de 22 años y Joel de 17 años; vive en su propia casa y se esmera por sacar adelante a sus hijos. La labor que realiza prudencio es labrar la tierra, donde cultiva plantas de cacao. Es conocedor del arduo trabajo que se realiza en el campo agrícola; donde viene trabajando 30 años en sus propias tierras, en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y jornaleros quienes se encargan de cosechar y  trasladar los productos recolectados hasta cierto tramo para luego ser transportados con vehículos menores. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas le dn una buena producción. Cuenta que la estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque son meses donde abundan mayor cantidad de insectos y precipitaciones de lluvia, perjudicando sus campos florales. Con el crédito solicitado comprará  más semillas de piña para expandir sus sembríos. Este es el crédito numero 11 con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal donde es muy estimado por el resto de los integrantes. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará productos químicos, abono para hacer el mantenimiento de sus cultivos.
texts.en: Prudencio, who is 44 years old, lives separate from his partner.  He has two children. Yuri is 22 years old, and Joel is 17 years old.  Prudencio lives in his own house and tries very hard to provide a better life for his children.  Prudencio works as a farmer, where he cultivates cocoa plants.  He works very hard on the farming field.  He has been working for 30 years on his own land.  During the planting season, he counts on the support of his children and day laborers who see to the planting and move the collected products to a certain place so that later in can be transported with small vehicles.  He feels very dedicated to his work.  Thanks to his daily effort, today he enjoys seeing his plants give him a good crop.  He says that he does not like the winter season because there is a large quantity of insects and rain during those months, damaging his floral fields.  With the loan that he is asking for, he will buy more pineapple seeds to expand his sown fields.  This is his 11th loan with MFP.  He knows that if he pays it on time, he will be able to obtain another loan with greater ease and will not bring complications to his communal bank where he is well-liked by the rest of the members.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will buy chemical and fertilizer products to maintain his crops.

loans.use: to buy chemical and fertilizer products to maintain his plants.

loans.name: San Luis Group

texts.es:
12 mujeres de la ciudad de San Lorenzo se han unido con el propósito de trabajar juntas y ayudarse las unas a las otras a mejorar sus estilos de vida. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, que trabajan todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día y vuelven ya muy tarde. Las miembros ven en el programa de  la fundación paraguaya una gran ayuda para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Teresa es una de las integrantes del grupo y ella nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de comidas d todo tipo, nos dice que le va muy bien puesto que ella tiene muy buena manos para la cocina y evidencia de ella es la cantidad de clientes que tiene, lo cual la ayuda mucho con con los gastos de manutención de la casa y de la familia. Su meta es tener un gran comedor donde poder vender los platillos que prepara.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, verduras, hortalizas, condimentos y demás insumos que necesite para elaborar sus alimentos.
texts.en: 12 women from the city of San Lorenzo have united with the purpose of working together and helping one another to improve their way of life.  They are very hardworking and enterprising women.  They work very hard every day from very early in the morning until very late.  The members see the Fundación Paraguay program as a great help in being able to better their life conditions.  Teresa is one of the members of the group.  She tells us that she sells foods of all kinds.  She says that it is going very well for her since she has very good hands in the kitchen.  This is evidenced by the quantity of customers that she has, which helps her a lot with the cost of maintaining her home and family.  Her goal is to have a big dining room where she will be able to sell the dishes that she prepares.  She is asking for the loan to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other foods that she needs to make her dishes.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other foods.

loans.name: Evelyn Scarlet

texts.es: Evelyn Scarlet es una emprendedora que  la actividad económica a la que se dedica a brindar los servicios de video juegos en el cual lo tiene ubicado  en su casa de habitación, ella es clienta de Fundación León se le ha brindado financiamiento para el negocio en el cual nos expresa que le ha ayudado mucho ya que aumentado los juegos y los clientes. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio en la compra de equipos y discos nuevos de juegos.
texts.en: Evelyn Scarlet is an entrepreneur whose business, which is located in her home, is offering video game services.  She is a client of Fundación León, which has offered her financing for her business.  She has expressed to us that this has helped her a lot since she has increased the number of games and customers.  Currently, she is requesting financing in order to invest in the business by purchasing equipment and new game disks.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and new video game disks.

loans.name: Moyopata-San Sebastian Group

texts.es:
La mayoría de los socios del banco comunal “MOYOPATA-SAN SEBASTIAN” se retiraron pero entraron otras   personas. Actualmente, el banco comunal encuentra en el noveno ciclo de funcionamiento (cada ciclo está conformado por 4 meses). El banco comunal está conformado por 10 personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. 

La socia Vilma, tiene 35 años, es padre y madre para sus dos hijos, ella trabaja en una de las municipalidades distritales de la ciudad del Cusco en el área de seguridad ciudadana. Ya son varios años que se dedica al trabajo y le ha va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone a sus funciones, ella requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para la alimentación y ropa de sus hijos.   

Los socios valoran y agradecen el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y así mismo se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido. (En la parte inferior de la fotografía aparece la socia que llego tarde a la reunión).
texts.en:
The majority of the members of the communal bank "Moyopata -- San Sebastian" have withdrawn from the group, but other people have joined. Now the communal bank is in its ninth loan cycle (each cycle is four months long). The communal bank consists of 10 hard-working and entrepreneurial people who are looking at every moment for opportunities to advance and with their daily effort to give their children a better future. The majority of the members live in the city, where they carry out their business activities. Cusco is known for being a very touristic and business area, for its traditional festival, the Inti Raymi, and because one of the seven marvels of the world, Machu Picchu, is found there.

Bank member Vilma, who is 35 years old, is both father and mother to her two children. She works in one of the municipal districts of the city of Cusco in the area of city security. She has done this work for a number of years, and it is going very well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into her duties. She needs a loan for personal use; she needs to buy food and clothing for her children.

The members appreciate and are grateful for the loan that is offered to them through this means, and they promise to make all their payments on the established schedule. (A member who arrived late for the meeting appears in the lower part of the photograph.)

loans.use: to buy food and clothing for her children.

loans.name: Nubia Carina

texts.es: Nubia Carina es soltera, habita junto a su familia compuesta por su mamá, 2 hermanos y 3 sobrinitos, trabaja como cajera en almacenes El Verdugo desde hace 1 años. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de comprar alambres y otros accesorios que serviran para instalar el sistema electrico de su casa, pues hace unos dias hizo cortocircuito y le recomendaron cambiarlo porque el que tiene no sirve.  Cabe mencionar que Nubia anteriormente fue beneficiada con kiva, pero para invertir en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa usada que tiene con su hermana.
texts.en: Nubia Carina is single, and lives with her family, which includes her mother, 2 brothers and 3 young nephews.  She has worked as a cashier in the El Verdugo store for a year.  She is requesting her 4th loan, with the goal of buying wires and other accessories that will be used to install an electrical system in her home.  A few days ago her electrical system short-circuited, and she's been told that it is not good and she needs to replace it.  It is worth mentioning that Nubia previously took a Kiva loan, but that one was invested in the small business that she has with her sister selling used clothing.

loans.use: to repair the electrical system in her house

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida.

Ella tiene 8 años de administrar su propio negocio de sala de belleza. Ella comenta que aprendió este oficio debido a que no pudo seguir estudiando y decidió sacar un curso de cosmetología y con el apoyo de su compañero de vida instalo su sala de belleza. Antes Ana solo se dedicaba a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa.

Para comprar los materiales que necesita en su negocio, se traslada a una ciudad del oriente del país en autobús durante una hora, ya que hay unos 35 kilómetros de su casa a la ciudad, ella va a comprar ahí por que le dan mejores precios. Ana sale muy temprano a realizar las compras para regresar a atender su negocio ya que tiene muchos clientes.

Ana solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar tintes, descolorantes, alicates, agujas de crocho, guantes, cremas spray, tijeras, entre otros más y la otra parte para cancelar otro crédito a la Fundación. Con la inversión dispondrá de mayor cantidad de productos para atender a sus clientes y brindarles un mejor servicio obteniendo mayores ingresos para ella y su familia, ya que ayudara a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.

Ana planea contar con un mejor establecimiento y más surtido, contratar a una persona para que le ayude a prestar un mejor servicio, pues por el momento solo ella trabaja en el local.
texts.en:
Ana is 28 years old. She lives with her common-law husband.

She has had 8 years of experience in running her own business, a beauty salon. She comments that she learned this trade because she could not continue going to school and decided to take a course in cosmetology. With the help of her husband, she set up her beauty shop. Before, Ana only carried out household duties in her home.

To buy the materials that she needs in her business, she travels by bus to a city in the eastern part of the country. The trip takes an hour, since it is about 35 kilometers from her house to the city. She goes there to make her purchases because they give her better prices there. Ana leaves very early to make her purchases so that she can come back and tend to her business, since she has many customers.

Ana is applying to Fudación Campo for a loan to buy dyes, bleaches, pliers, crochet hooks, gloves, spray creams, and scissors, among other items, and also to pay back another loan from the foundation. With the investment, she will have a greater quantity of products at her disposal, so that she tend to her customers and offer them better service, obtaining a greater income for her and her family, since she will help her husband with the household expenses.

Ana plans to have a better and more well-stocked shop and to hire a person to help her give better service, since at this time she works alone in the shop.

loans.use: to buy dyes, bleaches, pliers, crochet hooks, gloves, spray creams, and scissors, among other items, and to pay back another loan from the foundation

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Maria Del Rosario esta solicitando un crédito para comprar lo necesario para el equipo adecuado para la venta de tacos de barbacoa , ya que quiere agregar esta comida a su menú de alimentos a su pequeño negocio de venta de comido. 
Los que atiende el negocio son Doña Maria Del Rosario y su esposo quien son los que preparan la comida y atiende a sus clientes. 
Este negocio es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia y darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Desea invertir en el negocio y así tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Maria Del Rosario is requesting a loan to buy the proper equipment to sell barbequed meat tacos, because she wants to add this dish to her food menu in her small food business.  

Maria Del Rosario and her husband are the ones who run this business, preparing the food and tending to their customers.

This business is the source of income for their family, and it allows them to provide for the needs of their children.  Maria wants to invest in the business so that she can have greater earnings.

loans.use: to outfit her kitchen so that she can make and sell barbequed meat tacos

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: Reynaldo tiene 39 años, es un hombre alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Bertha de 43 años y sus 05 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Los campos de sembrado que con tanto esfuerzo a conseguido Reynaldo, son el principal sustento que tiene su familia, sus productos son muy solicitados en los centros de acopio donde los lleva a vender, ya que su notoriedad de cosechar cacao son de buena calidad y por lo cual sus productos son vendidos a muy buenos precios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plagas que pueden aquejarlos, ya que esto puede afectar sus ingresos. Lleva 17 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los sacos de sus cultivos, ya que son muy pesados y le quitan mucha energía. Con el crédito solicitado comprará sacos de abono para mejorar sus tierras y así posteriormente cosechar frutos en abundancia. Este es crédito numero 12 con MFP, sabe que el dinero del crédito le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo por el cual esta llano a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles; comprara sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Reynaldo, 39, is a happy and hardworking man.  He lives in his own home with his partner Bertha, 43, and their 5 beloved children, to whom they want to provide a better quality of life.  The farmland which Reynaldo has acquired with a lot of effort is the main source of sustenance for his family.  His products are very much sought after in the collection centers where he takes them to sell because of his reputation for harvesting good quality cocoa, and because he sells his products at very good prices.  What he likes most about his work is caring for his crops and preventing them from being attacked by pests, because this can affect his income.  He has been farming for 17 years, and what he considers most difficult is transporting his sacks of harvested crops, because they are very heavy and this takes a lot of energy.  

With the loan that he requests, he will buy sacks of organic fertilizer to improve his lands, so that he can later have an abundant harvest.  This is his 12th loan with MFP.  He knows that the money from this loan will be very helpful to him in developing his work, and so he is prepared to make his payments on time.  In his communal bank, he is a member who is very cheerful and who always brings order to the meetings.  With the 1,500 Peruvian soles he requests, he will buy sacks of manure to fertilize his fields.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: Luis Manuel  de 58 años de edad es casado, labora para el MINED desde hace 25 año como docente en una escuela de Tecolostote. Esta solicitando su 10mo credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa, reparando el piso de su cuarto que esta dañado. El profesor Luis se caracteriza por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos.  Es importante mencionar que los ultimos creditos que ha solicitado han sido para mejorar la casa en que vive, anteriormente logro mejorar las divisiones de los cuartos que se estaban deteriorando.  Expresa sentirse muy agradecido por el apoyo brindado por la institucion y por kiva, que esta apoyando a las personas pobres a mejorar su nivel de vida y el de su familia.
texts.en: Luis Manuel, 58, is married and has worked for MINED (the Ministry of Education) for 25 years as a teacher in a school in Tecolostote.  He is requesting his 10th loan, which he plans to use to continue to make improvements to his house, repairing a floor that is damaged in his room.  The teacher Luis is known to be very responsible with his commitments.  It is important to mention that the last loans that he has requested have also been used for improving the house that he lives in.  Previously, he managed to improve the walls between the rooms, which were deteriorating.  He expresses that he feels very grateful for the support provided by the institution and Kiva that is helping poor people and their families to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to repair a floor in his house

loans.name: Martha Ligia

texts.es: Martha de 34 años es soltera, trabaja para el MINED en la Escuela Enrique Tierno Galvan desde hace 15 años como maestra de primaria.  Esta solicitando refinanciamiento de su 9no credito con el objetivo de construir un anexo en casa de sus padres y asi contar con mayor privacidad y comodidad, pues necesita asegurar un poco sus cosas, ya que ha sido victima de robo de algunos vecinos. Cabe señalar que Martha se caracteriza por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos.
texts.en: Martha is 34 years old, single and has been working for MINED at the Enrique Tierno Galvan School for the past fifteen years as a primary school teacher. She is asking for another loan, her ninth loan, in order to build an addition to her parent’s house. They would like more privacy and comfort. They also need to secure their things more effectively, as some of their neighbors have been robbed. It needs to be noted that Martha is very responsible with her commitments

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Andre

texts.en: Andre is 49 years old. He is a father of seven children, aged between 11 and 21. All of his children go to school. He has requested the loan to buy more beans, maize, tomatoes and sorghum because he has shifted from the previous business from where he has joined the business of selling foodstuffs.
