She does well in her business because thanks to it she was able to buy more farmland for her husband to work.  In time she hopes to be able to enlarger her house as well as her store.

This is MFP loan #6 and she is very happy to know that she can once again count on support from lenders to continue growing.  She is a very participative, punctual member of her communal bank’s meetings.  She will use the 3000 new soles to buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sugar, oil, detergent, etc.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, sugar, oil and detergent.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: Blanca tiene 23 años, es una joven muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia y desea tener un buen futuro. Todos los días desde muy temprano abre su tienda de abarrotes para atender a sus vecinos, ella es una vendedora muy hábil, sabe como tratarlos y siempre los termina convenciendo de comprar algo más. Su tienda esta muy bien surtida de productos de primera necesidad tales como arroz, leche, variedad de cereales y menestras ya que siempre se preocupa por comprar los productos más consumidos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y enterarse de las cosas que suceden en su entorno vecinal. Lleva 03 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer de pie todo el lapso del día.  Para el bien de sus ingresos económicos más adelante espera ampliar las instalaciones de su tienda, para poder vender más productos. Este es el crédito número 03 con MFP, se siente muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará más sacos de arroz, azúcar conservas y entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Blanca is 23 years old.  She is a cheerful, hard-working young woman who lives in her own house and wants a good future.  She opens her grocery store very early every day to wait on her neighbors.  She is a highly skilled saleswoman as she knows how to treat her customers and she always convinces them to buy more.  Her store is very well-stocked with basic necessity products such as rice, milk, assorted grains and beans as she is always concerned with buying the most frequently consumed products.  Her favorite part of her job is conversing with her customers and finding out what is going on in the neighborhood.  She has been running this business for 3 years and considers standing on her feet all day the hardest part.  For the sake of her future income she hopes to expand her store so she can sell more products.  

This is her third loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support.  She feels secure buying with what she has requested and is committed to making her payments on time.  With the 2,000 nuevos soles [Peruvian currency] she will buy more sacks of rice, sugar, canned foods and other products.

loans.use: buy more sacks of rice, sugar, canned foods and other products.

loans.name: Magda Patricia

texts.es:
la sra Magda Patricia tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos los que estudian en centro educativo públicos de su comunidad, Magda se dedica brindar servicios de consulta medica, ella es medico general, contando con mas de 6 años de experiencia. su negocio se ubica en una de las calles del comercio, este negocio le genera utilidades para satisfacer gastos familiares y compromisos adquiridos.
la Dra. Magda es una persona muy reconocida en el municipio ya que ha formado parte de la corporación municipal y por su don de servicio a la comunidad en pro del bienestar y de la salud de los más desprotegidos.
El credito lo utilizara para la compra de medicamentos y así satisfacer la demanda de sus pacientes.
texts.en:
Magda Patricia, 41, is a single mother with two children enrolled in public school. 

Magda is a general practitioner with more than six years' experience. Her business is located on one of the main streets. Thanks to her business, she generates enough income to cover household and other expenses.

Magda is very well-known in her town for her service in favor of the well-being and health of people in need. She was also a member of the municipal council.

She is requesting this loan to buy medicines in order to meet her patient's demands.

loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy general merchandise.

loans.name: Claudia Leticia

texts.es:
la joven sra. Claudia tiene 25 años de edad, vive en unión libre y tiene 2 hijos. Claudia se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una tienda de venta de ropa y calzado,  tiene mas de 3 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, su negocio esta ubicado en la calle del comercio,  lugar muy estratégico en donde transitan muchas personas de diferentes aldeas y caseríos, lo que le permite tener una muy buena clientela, El credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa y zapatos.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
su meta es graduar a sus hijos para que sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Claudia, 25, lives in a common law marriage and has two sons. 

Claudia has been working as a retailer for more than three years. She has a clothes and shoe shop located in the main street, a very busy place where people of different village and farmhouses go to. Therefore, she has a great clientele.

She uses her income to provide for her family. Her dream is to have her sons graduate in order to become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy jeans, blouses, T-shirts, and sweaters, because they are in demand, and because she needs to have a greater variety of clothing to sell

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila, de 39 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Alberto  de 40 años y sus 04 queridos hijos, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Los productos que con tanta voluntad y entrega han logrado cultivar Cirila y su esposo, le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida. Todas las mañanas empieza a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus sembríos de cacao y café y achiotes, dependerá la calidad y el precio que obtenga. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuando los ve grandes y frondosos, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil, es transportar los pesados sacos de los productos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, lugar donde recibe mejores precios por sus granos. Más adelante, espera sembrar más plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con espacios sin cultivar. Este es el crédito número 01 con MFP, se siente feliz por contar con el apoyo de los financistas ya que gracias al apoyo de ellos esta prosperando. Cirila en esta oportunidad también espera beneficiarse con el crédito por lo cual ella esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, contratará peones para que le apoyen en el desmonte y cosechas de sus productos.
texts.en:
Cirila, 39, is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home along with her partner Alberto, 40, and their four dear children who are the primary reason for all their efforts. The products that Cirila and her husband have grown successfully with so much willpower and commitment have helped them considerably in their lives' progress. Each morning she begins working on her land since she knows that the care she gives her cocoa, coffee and annatto seedlings will determine the quality and price she obtains for them. What she enjoys most about her work is caring for her crops and she feels very happy when she sees them large and leafy. She has been in this business for 20 years and believes the most difficult part is transporting the heavy sacks of product to the city of San Francisco [Peru], the place where she receives the best prices for her beans and seeds. Down the road she hopes to plant more cocoa plants since she has some uncultivated areas. 

This is her first loan with MFP. She is happy to have the support of the lenders since, thanks to their support, she is prospering. Cirila also hopes to receive a benefit with the loan this time and so she is willing to make her payments punctually. With the 1,500 Peruvian soles she will hire day laborers to help her with clearing the land and harvesting her products.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Dario

texts.es: El señor Darío es una persona responsable y honesta que desde pequeño tuvo su ilusión de tener un negocio donde el pudiera tomar sus propias decisiones. Hace nueve años tuvo la oportunidad de comprar equipos de cómputo para iniciar su negocio de cibercafé que se ubica desde su domicilio. Ofrece internet, música, copias, algunos artículos de oficina y mas. Para Dario es muy importante tener sus equipos en buenas condiciones por lo que quiere comprar otro equipo nuevo que tenga la mejor procesador, de esta manera ofrecerá a su cliente mejor servicio y obtendrá mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Darío is a responsible and honest person who since he was young wished to have a business where he could make his own decisions.  Nine years ago he had the opportunity to buy computer equipment to start his internet cafe business that is located in his home.  He offers Internet, music, copies, some office supplies, and more.  For Darío it is very important to have his equipment in good condition, so he wants to buy new equipment that has the best processor.  In this way he will offer his customers better service and he will have a better income.

loans.use: to buy computer equipment.

loans.name: Demetria

texts.es: Demetria, de 30 años, es una mujer amable, sencilla y sobre todo muy trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Aurelio de 31 años y su querido hijo Jack de 09 años, a quien desea brindar un mejor futuro. La tienda de abarrotes de Demetria es una de las más concurridasde su localidad. El gran carisma que posee y la amabilidad en su trato, han hecho que sea la preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en hacer sus compras desde muy temprano, ya que saben que es la primera tienda en abrirse y la ultima en cerrarse. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus consumidores sobre la calidad y variedad de cada producto, lleva 10 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro de su tienda en espera de clientes ya que de eso depende sus ingresos económicos. Gracias al negocio que posee ha logrado comprar variedad de bienes para su hogar. Este es el crédito número 01 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de los financistas para seguir prosperando. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará más provisiones para su tienda de abarrotes como: sacos de arroz, azúcar, leche y entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Demetria, 30, is a pleasant, modest, and above all very hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her husband Aurelio, 31, and her beloved son Jack, 9, whom she wants to give a better future.

Demetria's grocery store is one of the busiest in her town.  Her great charisma and pleasant manner have made her store the one preferred by her neighbors, who do not hesitate to make their purchases very early because they know it is the first store to open and the last to close.  What she likes most about her work is advising her consumers about the quality and variety of each product.  She has been doing this work for ten years and she considers the most difficult thing to be staying in her store all day long waiting for customers, since her income depends on this.  Thanks to her business, she has been able to buy a variety of goods for her home.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that once again she will have the support of the lenders to continue prospering.

With the 1,500 PEN she will buy more supplies for her grocery store, such as bags of rice, sugar, and milk, among other products.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Carmen Trinidad

texts.es: Carmen Trinidad es una emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de leña y frijoles en la localidad donde habita. Carmen trinidad tiene 59 años de edad este negocio nace de la necesidad de generar ingreso, ella tiene hijos mayores que ya no están con ella pero le ayudan económicamente. Carmen Trinidad está solicitando crédito para comprar capital trabajo como leña y frijoles.
texts.en: Carmen Trinidad is a businesswoman who sells firewood and beans in the town where she lives.  Carmen Trinidad is 59 years old, and her business was born out of the need to generate income.  She has grown children who are not still with her, but they help her financially.  Carmen Trinidad is requesting a loan to use as working capital, so that she can buy firewood and beans.

loans.use: to buy firewood and beans

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: La señora Guillermina de 49 años es casada desde hace 4 años ella con el ayuda de su esposo el Sr. Ramiro decidió iniciar un negocio el cual le permitiera apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y que al mismo tiempo le permitiera atender las labores del  hogar como lo son lavar, planchar, cocinar, limpiar la casa. Buscando Guillermina la manera de no descuidar ninguna de estas actividades decidió vender ropa de segunda mano en su casa colocándola en las rejas de su casa. La señora Guillermina requiere el apoyo de comprar ropa de temporada de frio y calor para los cambios climáticos.
texts.en:
Guillermina, 49, is married.  Four years ago, with the help of her husband she decided to start a business that would allow her to help her husband with the household expenses.  At the same time it would allow her to take care of the household chores, which are washing clothes, ironing, cooking, and cleaning the house.  Looking for a way to not neglect any of this work, Guillermina decided to sell used clothing at home, placing it on the fence of her house.

Guillermina needs the support to buy clothes for cold and hot weather for the changes in climate.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing for her business.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, de 27 años, es un joven alegre y trabajador; viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de Manitea Alta. Él es un hombre trabajador, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesino y hasta el momento ha cultivado café, que con mucho esfuerzo consiguió tornarlas muy productivas. Tiene más de 15 años trabajando es ésta actividad, lo cual lo ha convertido en un gran conocedor en el mundo del agro. En tiempos de cosecha y deshierbo de maleza contrata peones quienes se encargan de acelerar con las faenas más pesadas; sus plantas le generan buenos ingresos, por lo cual las empresas acopiadoras de cuyos productos le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo. El problema de su trabajo radica en no poder combatir con los insectos quienes se encargan de dañar los frutos de las plantas. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras ya que no cuenta con espacios para seguir sembrando. Este es el crédito número 05 con MFP, se compromete en seguir aportando sus cuotas puntualmente como en los anteriores créditos, agradece a los socios de su banco comunal por elegirle como presidente de la junta directiva. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de cacao en edad de crecimiento por que desea cultivarlos de manera tecnificada.
texts.en: Edwin, 27, is a happy and hardworking youth who lives in his own house in the community of Manitea Alta.  He is a hardworking man who puts a lot of care into the work that he does.  He is a farmer who works the land, and up until now he has cultivated coffee.  He puts in a lot of effort in order to make his lands very productive.  He has been farming for more than 15 years, and has become very knowledgeable about the world of agriculture.  At harvest time and when he needs to weed his crops, he hires workers who help him get the most difficult tasks done more quickly.  His crops generate good earnings for him, as the wholesale companies who buy his products pay him well for each kilogram.  The main problem with his work is that he cannot fight off the insects that damage the fruits of his plants.  But now, his main priority is to buy new lands, because he does not have enough space for further planting. This is his 5th loan with MFP, and he is committed to continuing to make his payments on time, as he has done with the previous loans.  He thanks the members of his communal bank for electing him as president of the board.  With the 1,500 Peruvian soles he requests, he will buy cocoa seedlings that are ready to grow, because he wants to cultivate them in a way that makes use of modern technology.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants

loans.name: Erika Janeth

texts.es: La señora Erika de 28 años  es madre de 4 hijos de 9,8,5 y 2 años , con el apoyo de su esposo inicio su negocio de venta de accesorios y bolsas para dama que ofrece en pagos  para poder ajustar a la economía de sus clientas, en este momento requiere de un préstamo para comprar más mercancía ya que en la temporada de Navidad fue muy requerida por lo que se quedo con poco producto. A  Erika le gusta atender su negocio ya que le permite realizar las tareas cotidianas de ama de casa y atención de sus pequeños
texts.en:
Ms. Erika, 28, is the mother of four children who are 9, 8, 5 and 2 years old. With the support of her husband she began her business selling accessories and ladies' handbags which she offers on credit in order to accommodate her customer's financial situations. At this time she needs a loan to purchase more merchandise since during the Christmas season she sold a lot and so ended up without much product. 

Erika likes running her business since it allows her to carry out the daily activities of managing a household and caring for her little ones.

loans.use: to purchase accessories and handbags for her business.

loans.name: Maria Ivania

texts.es:
la sra. Maria tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos. Maria se dedica al comercio, vende  ropa americana clasificada, tiene 2 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad , en su negocio tiene un bonito surtido para ofrecerles a sus clientes con precios al alcance de sus bolsillos,  con las ganancias que le genera su negocio cubre los gastos del hogar. Maria a su vez también realiza sus ventas de forma domiciliar en los Barrio del casco urbano y aldeas aledañas al municipio.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa y asi tener mas variedad para sus clientes.
texts.en: Maria is 37 years old. She is a single mother of 2 children. Maria is a merchant. She sells sorted American clothes. She has been doing this activity for 2 years. Her business has a good variety to offer her customers at prices that they are good for their wallets. With her business' earnings, she covers her household expenses. Maria also does sales door to door in the downtown neighborhood and in the surrounding areas. She will use the loan to buy clothes and thus have more variety for her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
La señora María Jesús de 48 años de edad, casada desde hace 22 años, tiene 3 hijos de 22,18 y 15 años de edad, vive en La col. San Jorge, San Pedro Sula, su esposo trabaja como motorista.
Doña María, estableció un negocio de pulpería hace cinco años, ella vende lácteos, carnes, granos básicos, embutidos, refrescos, churros, agua y otros. Atiende el negocio todo el día, la ubicación ha favorecido para los clientes. Inició con fondos propios, ahora lleva seis prestamos invertidos en el negocio lo que a incrementado su inventario, al igual que este préstamo actual de 14,000.00 será invertido en compra de productos de abarrotería, granos básicos, lácteos, carnes, refrescos, etc. agradece el apoyo financiero han mejorado sus ingresos, en su vida familiar hay mas solvencia y espera seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
María Jesús, age 48, has been married for 22 years.  She has three children, ages 22, 18, and 15.  She lives in La Colonia San Jorge, San Pedro Sula.  Her husband works as a driver.

María established her grocery store business five years ago.  She sells dairy products, meat, basic grains, sausages, soft drinks, churros, water, and others.  She tends to her business all day.  Her location is a favorable one for customers.  

She started with her own funds.  She now has six loans invested in the business, which has increased her inventory.  This loan for 14,000.00 will be used in the same way.  She will use it to buy grocery products, basic grains, dairy products, meat, and soft drinks, etc.  She is grateful for the financial support that has improved her income.  Her family is now more solvent, and she hopes to continue growing.

loans.use: to stock up on products like beans, rice, sugar, cleaning products, water, dairy products, meat, sausages, and soft drinks, etc.

location.town: Col. San Jorge, San Pedro Sula

loans.name: Yamileth

texts.es:
Doña Yamileth, continua con su negocio un comedor, en donde hace variedad de platillos todos los dias, pues gracias al apoyo de su esposo economicamente y con financiamiento ha logrado mantener y promover su comedor. En donde desde horas tempranas prepara los alimentos para a tender a los clientes.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo, hara compra de granos basicos, carne, pollo, productos lacteos, verduras, frescos, coca cola, utencilios para seguir dando un buen servicio de alimento como de una buena atencion. Su objetivo es crecer logrando la captacion de mas clientes, lo que le genera mejores utilidade.
texts.en:
Yamileth continues with her restaurant business, where she offers a variety of dishes every day. Thanks to her husband's financial support and with financing she has been able to maintain and promote her restaurant. There she starts preparing the food very early to tend to her customers.     

Today, with this new loan, she will buy basic grains, meat, chicken, dairy products, vegetables, drinks, Coca-Cola, and utensils to keep giving good food and good service. Her goal is to keep growing her capacity for more customers, which generates better profits.

loans.use: to invest in buying basic grains, vegetables, fruit and soft drinks to keep offering the best services.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es: Efraín tiene 25 años de edad, convive con Sonia de 26 años y juntos viven en su propia casa con sus 02 hijos, Yony de 05 años y Heidy de 03 años donde reina la armonía. La labor que realiza Efraín es labrar la tierra, donde cultiva plantas de café. Sus padres le enseñaron a remover la tierra y con sus ahorros acumulados pudo concretar sus ansias de contar con su propia parcela. Es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el campo; donde viene trabajando 15 años en sus propias tierras. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y jornaleros quienes se encargan de trasladar los productos cosechados hasta cierto tramo; para luego ser comercializados. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta ver su frutos. Asimismo nos comenta que la estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque son meses donde abundan mayor cantidad de insectos perjudicando a sus sembríos. Este es el crédito número 01 con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café para luego injertarlos y sacar buen beneficio de sus frutos.
texts.en:
Efraín is 25 years old and lives with Sonia who is 26 in their own home with their two children: Yony who is five and Heidy who is 3, where harmony reigns. The work that Efraín does is working the earth, where he cultivates coffee plants. His parents taught him to till the earth and with his accumulated savings he was able to realize his urge to have his own plot of land. He knows of the arduous work in the fields, as he has worked his own land for 15 years. During harvest season he has the support of his children and day laborers who take care of transporting the harvested products a certain distance for their eventual sale. He feels strongly committed to his work, because thanks to his daily effort he today enjoys seeing the results. Similarly he comments that the winter season is not to his liking because those are the months in which a greater number of insects abound which are damaging to his crops. 

This is his first loan with MFP. He knows that if he pays on time he will have access to another loan more easily and without causing complications for his communal bank. With the 1,000 Peruvian soles he will purchase coffee plants to be grafted and make a good profit from his results.

loans.use: to purchase coffee plants.

loans.name: Jazmina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Jazmina continua con sus ventas de cosmetico y ropa, lo que tiene varios años comercializando, y logrando la captacion de clientes, es madre soltera de dos hijos estudiantes, y cada dia se esfuerzan para poder lograr mejoras de ingreso para dar lo mejor a sus hijos.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento, comprara ropa y uniformes escolares para niña y niños ya que comenzara el ingreso a clases, y es buena temporada para las ventas, obteniendo mejores beneficios para su familia.
texts.en:
Jazmina continues selling cosmetics and clothing which she’s been selling for several years now and has acquired customers.  She’s a single mother of two children who are students.  She strives daily to earn better income to provide the best for her children.

Today, this new loan is to buy clothes and school uniforms for boys and girls because the new school term is starting and it’s a good season for sales thus obtaining better benefits for her family.

loans.use: to buy varied clothes and school uniforms.

loans.name: Agripina De Jesus

texts.es:
la sra. Agripina de Jesús tiene 30 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de 3 hijos los cuales estan estudiando en la escuela publica de la comunidad, Su actividad principal es el comercio y cuenta con una pulpería en su casa de habitacion, realiza esta actividad desde hace 18 meses y nos manifesto que durante todo este tiempo le ha ido muy bien, junto con su esposo se apoyan para salir adelante con su familia.
su esposo se dedica a la venta de ropa en el sector de la montaña de Guanacastales y en ocaciones con su vehiculo realiza fletes a diferentes partes de su localidad.
La Sra. Agripina utilizara el credito para la compra de mercadería y así surtir su negocio para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Agripina de Jesús, 30, is married and has 3 children, 2 that are studying in the local public school.  Her main business is commerce and she has had a general store in her house for the past 18 months.  She tells us that during this period it has done very well and that she, with her husband's support, are working to get their family ahead.
Her husband sells clothing in the Montaña de Guanacastales area and sometimes he drives passengers to different parts of his town.
Agripina will use the loan to buy merchandise and thus stock her business to satisfy the requests of her customers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as basic grains, meats, bread, soft drinks and juices

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to put up concrete walls in a room that has walls made of zinc sheet metal.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix, de 57 años de edad, vive en la comunidad de Manitea Alta, donde tiene su propia casa, construido a base de material rustico. Félix asegura que el producto de cacao se ha convertido en los últimos años en un gran negocio, no solo para él, sino para el resto de los campesinos, desde luego que está sacando el máximo provecho a sus plantaciones. Cada año va tomando presencia en su localidad, de esta manera trata de mejorar en cuanto a la calidad de su producto. En épocas de cosecha y deshierbo de malezas necesita el apoyo de los jornaleros, con la finalidad de obtener mayor rendimiento en su faena laboral. Su punto de venta lo realiza en los centros de acopio de su misma localidad y su rutina diaria es desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana hasta horas de la tarde. Con el transcurso del tiempo piensa en comprar semillas de café  para luego sembrarlas  y con el tiempo obtener mejores ingresos. Este es el crédito número 08 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además siente que llegará lo mas lejos posible con su banco comunal, ya que todos están conformen por el buen manejo de su grupo.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará semillas de cacao para seguir sembrando ya que cuenta con 01 hectrea de terreno sin cultivar.
texts.en:
Felix is 57, and lives in the community of Manitea Alta, where he has his own house, constructed from basic materials. Felix says that growing cacao  has become a great business in the last few years, not only for him, but for the rest of the farmers, and indeed, he is getting the maximum benefit from his plantations. Each year, it is gradually making its presence felt in his area, so he tries to improve the quality of his product. 

At harvest and weeding time, he needs the help of day laborers, in order to get greater yield from his work. He carries out his sales at the local collection centers, and his daily routine goes from the very early hours of the morning, until the evening hours. 

Over time, he is thinking about buying coffee seeds for planting, in order to eventually earn better income.

This is his eighth loan with MFP, so he promises to continue making his scheduled payments. In addition, he feels he will go as far as possible with his communal bank, as everyone is satisfied with how well the group is managed. 

With the 2,000 nuevos soles, he will buy cacao seeds to keep planting, as he has one hectare of land not cultivated.

loans.use: To buy cacao seeds.

loans.name: Sembrando Group

texts.es:
La mayoría de los socios del banco comunal “Sembrando” siguen participando y les va muy porque son personas responsables con los pagos de las cuotas. Actualmente, el banco comunal se encuentra en el segundo ciclo de funcionamiento (cada ciclo está conformado por cuatro meses). El banco comunal está conformado por nueve personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. 

La socia Junia nació en la distrito de Pomacanchis provincia de Acomayo departamento del Cusco y tiene 46 años edad, ella tiene un hijo de 19 años que está estudiando en un instituto superior, ella es profesora de educación especial en el programa ECEBE de la ciudad del Cusco, ella también pertenece al equipo de trabajo SAANEE (Servicio de Atención a la Diversidad a las Necesidades Educativas Especiales.).   
 
La socia nos cuenta que desde los 5 años hasta los 27 años edad vivió en la ciudad de Lima y donde estudió en una de las universidad más prestigiosas de la ciudad de Lima pero actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco, Ya son varios años que se dedica al trabajo y le ha va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone a sus funciones, ella requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para la educación de su hijo.   

Los socios valoran y agradecen el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y así mismo se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido. (En la parte inferior de la fotografía aparece la socia que llego tarde a la reunión).
texts.en:
Most of the members of “Sembrando” Communal Bank are still participating in the program and they are doing well because they're responsible with their payments. The Communal Bank is currently on its second cycle (each cycle lasting 4 months) and is comprised of nine hardworking people with a marked entrepreneurial spirit who tirelessly seek ways to move forward and give their children a better future. Most of the members live in the city, where they also have their livelihoods. Cusco is widely known as a city for tourism and trade, hosting the traditional Inti Raymi festivity and one of the seven wonders of the world, “Machupicchu”. 

Our featured member, Junia, was born in Pomacanchis District, in the Acomayo Province of the Departament of Cusco. She is 46 and has a 19-year-old son that attends a technical school. She works as a teacher for children with special needs as part of the ECEBE Program in Cusco City and also belongs to SAANEE's working group (SAANEE stands in Spanish for the Service for Bringing Diversity to Special Educational Needs).
 
She says she lived in Lima from age 5 to 27, where she studied in one of the most prestigious local universities but she now lives in Cusco. She has been working in her field for several years and has done well thanks to her dedication. She is asking for this loan for personal use, i.e., providing education to her son.  

All members appreciate the loan and are thankful for the opportunity given and promise to make their payments on time, according to schedule. (The lower right end of the main picture shows the member that arrived late to the meeting).

loans.use: to educate her son

loans.name: Ebert Gonzalo

texts.es:
Ebert es un joven que a sus 19 años de edad tienen la responsabilidad de un adulto de 50 años, el vive en la ciudad de chincha, 	ciudad por su población de origen afroperuano, por sus danzas y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, por sus hermosas playas y por la producción de nuestro producto Bandera el “Pisco”, también esta ciudad es muy conocida por su comida ya que los pobladores de esa ciudad se les conoce por la buena sazón que tienen, el plato que le gusta mucho es el riquísimo arroz con pato, en cada reunión familiar siempre aprovecha la oportunidad de comerlo, a Ebert le gusta escuchar música en sus tiempos libres ya que se distrae mucho cuando se siente preocupado, estudio solo hasta quinto de secundaria ya que sus padres no tenían el dinero suficiente.

Ebert trabaja en la venta de frutas, se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado de su ciudad ya que vente sus productos allí, labora alrededor de 10 horas diarias y los días donde hay mayor venta de sus productos son los sábados y domingos, el no tiene día de descanso trabaja muy duro por salir adelante, en el día atiende alrededor de 20 clientes diarios, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque brinda una buena atención a sus clientes y sobre todo por la calidad de sus productos.

Ebert está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva porque su ayuda ha sido muy valiosa ya que ha podido comprar mas productos y mejorar su local de venta, esta mejora lo ayudara a tener mayores ingresos para seguir ahorrando y poder cumplir su más grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Ebert is a young man who at the age of 19 has responsibility for a 50-year-old adult. He lives in the city of Chincha, known for its population of Afro-Peruvian origin, for its dances and as the cradle of the great glories of Peruvian sports, as well as for its beautiful beaches and its production of the national beverage, pisco. This city is also well-known for its food, because the inhabitants are famous for the excellent seasoning they use. The dish that Ebert likes a lot is the delicious arroz con pato [duck with rice]. At each family gathering, he always takes advantage of the opportunity to eat it. Ebert likes to listen to music in his free time, since it helps take his mind off his worries. He studied only up to the fifth year of secondary school, since his parents did not have enough money for him to continue. 

Ebert works selling fruit. He gets up very early to go to the market of his city, since he sells his products there. He works about 10 hours each day, and the days when he has the best sales are Saturdays and Sundays. He does not have a day off; he works very hard to get ahead. He serves about 20 customers over the course of a day. He thinks that his business is going well for him, because he provides good service to his customers, and above all, his products are of high quality. 

Ebert is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because their help has been very valuable, allowing him to buy more products and improve his sales stand. This improvement will help him earn a better income so he can keep saving and fulfill his greatest dream: "to earn a university degree."

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Norma Jhaquelin

texts.es:
La Señora. Norma es socia del banco comunal Los Laureles, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, en su entorno se encuentran,  grandes pastos de fincas ganaderas y viejas hacienda, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de ganado y a la agricultura, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Norma tiene 27 años, está separada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de 10 y 1 año de edad, su primera hija está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora Norma trabaja como empleada domestica, actividad que la desempeña desde una muy corta edad, trabaja de lunes a viernes todo el día. En su casa se dedica a cuidar a sus hijos y también cría y vende pollos y cuyes.
 
Se encuentra en el tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en alimento para los mismos.

Su meta es agrandar su casa.
texts.en:
Norma is a member of the "Los Laureles" communal bank, and lives on the outskirts of Cumbe parish in Cuenca.  This is a place with a cold climate, surrounded by old estates and large pastures of cattle farms. Its people have small businesses, raise livestock, and farm, while maintaining the traditions of their peoples. 

Norma is 27, separated, and has two children, ages 10 and 1. Her eldest daughter goes to a small school in the city.  She owns the house where they live. 

Norma works as a housekeeper, an occupation she has worked at since she was very young. She works all day long, from Monday to Friday. In her home, she looks after her children, and also raises and sells chickens and guinea pigs.

This is her third loan with the communal bank, and she will use it to buy chickens and chicken feed. Her goal is to enlarge her home.

loans.use: To buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Wilber

texts.es: Wilber es socio del Banco Comunal Las Margaritas, tiene 25 años, es dueño de un taller donde elaboran artesanías y telares, tiene un hijo, es socio de Finca Perú desde hace 3 años, lo que mas le gusta de Finca es que puede ahorrar y esta muy bien en su negocio, ahora lo que él desea es poder tener una tienda donde pueda vender al público, porque ahora solo vende al por mayor, todo lo que aprendió en Finca lo puso en práctica y esa es la razón de su éxito, las capacitaciones le hacen reflexionar y lo aplico en su vida personal, este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de lana e insumos para el teñido de los telares.
texts.en: Wilber is a member of the Banco Comunal Las Margaritas (Daisies Communal Bank), he is 25 years old, and he owns a workshop where he creates handicrafts and weavings. He has a son and he has been a member of Finca Peru for 3 years. What he likes the most about Finca is the fact that he is able to save and his activity is going very well. He now dreams of owing a shop where to sell his products to the general public, as he currently sells in bulks only. He has put into practice everything he has learned in Finca, and this is the reason of his success. The training seminars help him making considerations he then also applies to his personal life. He will invest this loan in the purchase of wool and supplies to dye his weavings.

loans.use: To buy wool and supplies to dye his weavings.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel es socio del Banco Comunal Las Margaritas, tiene 19 años, el es músico, toca los timbales, no tiene hijos, es socio de Finca Perú desde hace 2 años, desde my joven siempre trabajo, gracias a la invitación de su hermano entró a Finca y desde la fecha no se ha retirado por el contrario se esfuerza para poder ser puntual y responsable, le sirve mucho las capacitaciones que recibe y  las aplica en su vida, le enseña a poder administrar mejor su dinero, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de su batería, y lo que más desea es poder tener un grupo musical y crecer como músico.
texts.en: Miguel is a member of the Banco Comunal Las Margaritas (Daisies Communal Bank), he is 19 years old, he has no children and he is a musician, a timpani player. He has been a member of Finca Peru for 2 years, and he has been working since he was young. He has been invited to join Finca by his brother, and rather than withdrawing from the group, he makes every possible effort to be punctual and responsible. The training seminars he attends are very helpful for him, and he applies them to his life. He has learned how to better manage his money, and the loan he is currently requesting will be used to buy drums. What he wants the most is to have his own music band and to grow as a musician.

loans.use: To buy drums.

loans.name: María Manuela

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Los Laureles, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, en su entorno se encuentran grandes pastos de fincas ganaderas viejas  haciendas, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de ganado y agricultura, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. María tiene 55 años, está separada de su marido y en su unión conyugal ha concebido ha concebido 8 hijos, 6 de sus hijos son casados e independientes, su penúltimo hijo tiene 19 años, trabaja y le ayuda económicamente y su último hijo de 15 años estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
Doña María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como pasa la mayor parte del tiempo en su casa cría y vende gallinas,también trabaja en la agricultura y lo que cosecha es solo para el consumo de su hogar.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos y pollos para iniciar en esta actividad. 

Su meta es seguir en el negocio de animales y agrandarlo.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the "Los Laureles" communal bank. She lives on the outskirts of the Cumbe parish in Cuenca, This is a place with a cold climate, surrounded by old estates and the large pastures of cattle farms. Its people have small businesses, raise livestock, and farm, while maintaining the culture and traditions of their peoples.

Maria is 55, separated from her husband, and has eight children. Six of her children are married and independent. Her second youngest child is 19, works, and helps her financially. Her youngest child is 15, and goes to a high school in the city. She owns the house where she lives.

Maria works doing her household chores, and as she spends the greater part of her time at home, she raises and sells chickens. She also farms, and what she harvests is only for her household's consumption. 

She is in her third loan cycle with the communal bank, and will use her new loan to buy pigs and chickens, and to get started in this activity. Her goal is to continue with her livestock-raising business, and expand it.

loans.use: To buy pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel, de 25 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajador vive en su propia casa ubicado en la localidad de Manitea Alta. La labor que realiza Fidel es labrar la tierra, donde cultiva plantas de café. Sus padres le enseñaron a remover la tierra desde muy niño, ha la edad de 05 años compró su propia parcela desde entonces viene trabajando en sus propias tierras. Fidel en tiempos de cosecha y deshierbo de maleza necesita apoyo, es por ello que contrata jornaleros para tener mayor celeridad en  sus actividades. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo, porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver sus plantas frodosas. Asimismo nos comenta que la  estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque son épocas donde abunda mayor cantidad de precipitaciones de lluvia así estropeando los hijuelos de sus cultivos. Este es el crédito número 04 con MFP, está dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, podrá comprar sacos de abono para mejorar y aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
Fidel is 25, and a very hard-working young man. He lives in his own house, located in the community of Manitea Alta. Fidel works the land, and grows coffee plants. His parents taught him to till the soil from a very young age. Five years ago he bought his own plot, and since then, he has been working on his own land. 

At harvest and weeding time, Fidel needs help, and that's why he hires day laborers in order to get his tasks done more quickly. He feels very committed to his work, because thanks to his daily efforts, today he enjoys seeing his plants in leaf.  

As well, he tells us that the winter season isn't to his liking, because this is when the rains are heavier, and can damage the shoots of his crops. 

This is his fourth loan with MFP, and he is ready to pay all his installments on time, as he wishes to access another loan later on. He is a very active member of his communal bank. 

With the 1,500 nuevos soles, he will be able to buy sacks of fertilizer for improving and increasing his production.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Matilñde Del Pilar

texts.es: Matilde del Pilar tiene 56 años de edad , ella es propietaria de un negocio en el cual no está solicitando el crédito para el negocio si no para acondicionar su vivienda donde habita que es su mayor sueño de acondicionar. El crédito que está solicitando es para construcción de un dormitorio lo cual comprara perlines, cemento, zic entre otros equipo para la construcción.
texts.en: Matilde del Pilar is 56 years old. She owns a shop but she is not requesting a loan for her activity, but to improve the house where she lives, as this is her greatest dream. The loan she is requesting will be used to have a bedroom built: she will buy purlins, cement, zinc and other construction materials.

loans.use: To buy purlins, cement and zinc.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es:
Joel de 35 años, soltero, vive en una colonia periférica de San Pedro Sula junto a sus dos hijas de tres y cinco años de edad.
Desde muy pequeño aprendió a confeccionar ropa junto a su padre, quien le enseño un medio de ganarse la vida,  tiene aproximadamente siete años de trabajar en su propio negocio independiente y brinda el servicio de confección de ropa de vestir como camisas, pantalones y pantalones cortos para hombres. Además realiza otra actividad de reparación de zapatos. A la sastrería le dedica todo el día y todos los días de la semana. Esta solicitando su primer préstamo a ODEF, para comprar materia prima como telas, hilos, agujas y otros materiales para la confección de ropa. Tiene como meta brindar un mejor servicio para aumentar sus ingresos y lograr que sus hijas estudien y tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Joel is 35 years old and single.  He lives in one of San Pedro Sula’s outlying neighborhood with his two daughters, ages three and five.  He learned how to make clothes from his father, who taught him a way of making a living, when he was very young. He has been working in his own independent business for approximately seven years.  He makes clothes like shirts, pants, and shorts for men.

He also has another business activity, repairing shoes.  He works all day every day of the week making clothes.

He is requesting his first loan from ODEF.  He will use it to buy raw material like fabric, thread, needles, and other materials for making clothes.  His goal is to provide better service in order to increase his income, to enroll his daughters in school, and to give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and other items for making clothes.

location.town: Colonia Cerrito Lindo, San Pedro Sula

loans.name: Gans

texts.es: Gans de 18 años de edad, convive con Elitza de 17 años; habitan en su propio lecho construido a base de material rustico madera y techo de calamina. Los campos de cultivo que con tanto esfuerzo ha conseguido Gans, son el principal sustento que tiene toda su familia, sus productos son muy solicitados en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que su notoriedad de cosechar cacao, café y frutos de maní son de muy buena calidad y por lo cual sus productos son vendidos a buenos precios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plagas que pueden aquejarlos, ya que esto puede afectar sus ingresos, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los pesados sacos de sus productos desde la chacra hasta los tendales. posteriormente comprará mas espacios de terreno, porque tiene pensado sembrar más plantas de café. Este es el crédito número 01 con MFP, se siente muy contento de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesto a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en: Gans, who is 18 years old, lives with Elitza, who is 17 years old.  They live in their own home that's built on a foundation of rustic wood and has a corrugated iron roof.  The crop fields that Gans has obtained with a lot of effort are the main sustenance that the whole family has.  His products are in high demand in the city of San Francisco.  This is because his cocoa, coffee, and peanut crops are well-known for being of very good quality, and his products are sold at very good prices.  What he likes the most about his work is caring for his crops from the pests that can afflict them, since this can affect his income.  He has been doing this activity for 10 years, and he thinks that the most difficult thing is transporting the heavy sacks of his products from the small farm to the drying areas.  Later, he will buy more plots of land, because he has thoughts of planting more coffee plants.  This is his first credit with MFP.  He feels very happy to know that he will have financial support, since this way he will feel sure about buying what he asks for.  He is ready to pay the scheduled payments punctually.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will buy sacks of manure to fertilize his lands.

loans.use: buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Flor De Otoño Group

texts.es:
Flor de otoño, su nombre describe perfectamente el espíritu de este animado grupo de emprendedoras mujeres que ha decidido invertir en sus negocios para crecer y florecer.
Bertha, una de sus integrantes, es madre de dos niños. Cuando inicio la aventura del matrimonio desconocía las altas y bajas económicas que sobrevenían debido a la inestabilidad laboral que su esposo tendría. Entonces ella, impulsada por el amor, comenzó a idear  alternativas que pudieran mejorar su realidad de vida. Pensando en las posibilidades,  al fin se decidió por comprar  abarrotes básicos he iniciar una venta informal en su casa. Con el paso del tiempo y la aceptación en la colonia el negocio fue tomando lugar y forma. 
Este negocio le ha dado frutos y ha convenido contraer un préstamo para enriquecer sus productos en estas fechas.
Tiene esperanza de empezar el nuevo año con el pie derecho.
texts.en:
Flor de Otoño [Autumn Flower].  The name describes perfectly the spirit of this lively group of women entrepreneurs who have decided to invest in their businesses in order to grow and flourish.

Bertha, one of the members, is the mother of two children.  When she started the adventure of marriage she did not know the economic highs and lows that were going to follow because of the work instability that her husband would have.  So then, driven by love, she began to devise alternatives that could improve the reality of their life.  Thinking about the possibilities, finally she decided to buy basic groceries and start an informal sale in her house.  With the passage of time and acceptance in the neighborhood, the business started to take place and shape.

This business has borne fruit for her and it has been advisable to get a loan to enrich her products during this time.

She hopes to begin the new year on the right foot.

loans.use: to invest in products to enrich her grocery store.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: La señora Graciela de 33 años es madre de 2 hijos que solo dependen de ella, ya que por razones ajenas a ella se tuvo que separar de su marido. Graciela inicio con un negocio de agua Purificada que vende en galones de 5 litros y distribuye por toda la ciudad, este negocio es su única fuente de ingresos por tal motivo quiere comprar mercancía como tapones, plásticos, desinfectantes profesionales para que su agua tenga las mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Graciela is 33 years old. She has 2 children and she alone is economically responsible for them, as she and her husband are separated because of circumstances that lay outside of her power. Graciela started an activity selling purified water by the gallon, and she distributes water all over her town. This activity is her only source of income, and for this reason she wants to buy products such as caps, plastic bottles and professional disinfectants to keep the water she sells in the best conditions.

loans.use: To buy caps, plastic bottles and professional disinfectants.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
La señora Soledad tiene tiempo con su vivienda y poco a poco ha ampliado pero desea tener un cuarto ya terminada y que sus hijos están creciendo y necesitan su espacio en la casa. Es por eso que solicita el préstamo para comprar el material, que es cemento, block, arena  y varilla, ya que su esposo se encargara de realizar la mejorar en horario adicional a su trabajo. 
Doña Soledad trabaja como enfermera en un centro de salud de la ciudad y sus esposo trabaja como empleado del gobierno, entre los dos han formado un patrimonio para sus hijos y desean que este en mejores condiciones y seguro para ellos. 
Con el ingreso que gana la señora Soledad pagaran el crédito y que con el sueldo de su esposo será para los gastos familiares y escolares de sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Soledad has been in her home a long time and little by little she has expanded, but she wants to finish a room.  Her children are growing and need their space in the house.  This is why she is requesting the loan, to buy the materials, which are cement, blocks, sand, and rods.  Her husband is going to deal with making the improvements in addition to his job.

Soledad works as a nurse in a city health center and her husband works as a government employee.  Between them they have created a legacy for their children, and they want it to be in better condition and safe for them.

With the income that Soledad earns they will pay back the loan.  Her husband's salary will be for family expenses and their two children's school expenses.

loans.use: to finish building a room on the ground floor.

loans.name: Roger Antonio

texts.es: Roger Antonio tiene 35 años de edad, se dedica a un taller de costura ya tiene varios años de experiencia en el negocio, este taller lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación muchas de las empresas lo buscan por la calidad de servicio que brinda. Roger Antonio está solicitando financiamiento para comprar telas, hilos entre otras cosas que necesita para la elaboración de la prendas.
texts.en: Roger Antonio, 35, is a tailor with many years of experience.  His shop is located in his house and many companies seek him out because of the quality of his service.  Roger Antonio is requesting a loan to buy fabrics, thread and other items he needs to make clothing.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, thread and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a variety of merchandise in all styles.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.es:
Jonathan es un joven de 28 años que se encuentra casado con Jazmin desde hace ya 5 años, juntos procrearon a un hijo el cual estudia actualmente, ellos viven en un municipio muy emprendedor, todos los días él y su esposa vendían en una tienda de ropa en el centro de su municipio, él ya había solicitado créditos en Fundación Realidad para invertir en esta tienda.

Como Jonathan es un hombre muy trabajador y sobre todo emprendedor, puso hace cuatro años su propio consultorio dental, al que asisten de 5 a 10 pacientes diarios, él quiere invertir este nuevo préstamo para comprar amalgamas, resinas y material para acondicionar su consultorio dental.

Él sabe que este es un negocio de éxito ya que lo ha comprobado tras cuatro años como odontólogo, él se apoya de este crédito para salir adelante.

Espera tener mejores ingresos con esta nueva inversión.
texts.en:
Jonathan, 28, has been married to Jazmin Sanchez Gonzalez for five years and they have a son in school.  They live in a very entrepreneurial town in the northern part of the state of México.  Every day he and his wife worked at the clothing store they had in the town.  He had requested loans through Fundación Realidad to invest in the store.

Since Jonathan is a very hard worker and, above all, very enterprising, four years ago he set up his own dental practice where he receives five to ten patients a day.  He is requesting a new loan to buy amalgam, resins and material for his dental practice.

He knows that this is a successful business after four years of practicing as a dental surgeon.  He relies on the loans to help him get ahead.

He hopes to improve his income through new investment.

loans.use: To buy materials for dental treatment.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: Cecilia una mujer soltera de 35 años que sola ha podido salir adelante, trabajando con mucho esfuerzo para ir construyendo su patrimonio. Hace unos años adquirió su vivienda de interés social a la cual ha estado haciendo mejoras para acondicionarla a su gusto. En este momento quiere un préstamo para terminar de colocar el vitropiso por toda la casa por lo que necesita comprar el material, pegamento y pagar la mano de obra. Esto con el fin de ir mejorando su calidad de vida y utilizar su dinero en cosas que realmente son necesarias. Ella quiere formar su propia familia por tal motivo quiere ir preparando su casa para ofrecer un mejor patrimonio.
texts.en: Cecilia, 35, is single and has been able to get ahead on her own.  She has worked hard to own property.  A few years ago she bought a subsidized house which she has been remodeling to suit her taste.  Now she is requesting a loan to finish installing glazed floor tile throughout the house, so she needs to buy the material and glue, and hire workers for the job.  Her idea is to improve her lifestyle and use the money for things that are really necessary.  She would like to form her own family and wants to prepare her house so she has better assets to offer.

loans.use: To buy glazed tile and glue, and to hire workers.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is widowed with two children. Anecita is 48 years old and lives in D'ban, Calamba.

To earn a living, Anecita has a bakery business. She has had this business for 11 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 15,000. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase 20 sacks of flour and other ingredients for bread-making. Anecita has been a member of PMPC for less than a year.

loans.use: To purchase 20 sacks of flour and other ingredients for bread-making.

loans.name: Trust Group

texts.en:
Emelita is married with four children. Emelita is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Emelita is a farmer and grows "palay" or rice crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 30 years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers for her rice crop plantation.

Emelita has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Emelita hopes to have a rice mill.

Emelita is the leader of a 4-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her rice crop plantation.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is married with six adult children.  Lilia is 49 years old and lives in Helen, Larena, Siquijor.   
Lilia has a vegetable garden to earn a living.  She has been doing this for 3 years. She has requested a loan of 15,000 to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for growing in her vegetables garden business.
Lilia has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for more than one year.  In the future, Lilia hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticides for growing of vegetables

loans.name: Genie

texts.en:
Genie is 42 years old and lives in Olo, Siquijor, Province of Siquijor, Philippines.  She is married with two school-aged children.  Genie sells fresh fish on the market everyday to earn a living.  She has been doing this for 10 years. She earns PHP 2,500.00 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan of 10,000 to purchase freshly-caught fish from fisherman and deliver to the market. 
Genie has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for six months.  In the future, Genie hopes to improve their living condition.

loans.use: To purchase freshly caught fish from fisherman and deliver to the market

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.en: Leonarda is married with four adult children. She is 51 years old and lives in Tacloban, Siquijor Province. To earn a living, Leonarda is an iron scrap and plastic materials buyer. She has had this business for two years. Each month, she earns approximately 2,000 Philippine pesos. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase recyclable materials such as iron scrap and plastic materials. Leonarda has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for more than one year. In the future, Leonarda hopes to have savings deposits from the income of her business.

loans.use: to purchase recyclable materials such as iron scrap and plastic materials

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 37 years old and lives in Tacloban, Siquijor, Siquijor. She is married with two children. To earn a living, Jocelyn sells food every day. Each month, she earns 2,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her food vending.

Jocelyn has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for more than one year. In the future, Jocelyn hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her food vending

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana sells fish every day to earn a living. She is 57 years old and lives in Tacloban, Siquijor, Siquijor. She is married with two adult children. Juana has been in this business for three years. She has requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos to purchase more fish to sell.

Juana has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for more than one year. In the future, Juana hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
To earn a living, Roselyn has a grocery store business. Roselyn is married with two school-age children. She is 32 years old and lives in Caticugan, Siquijor, Siquijor. Roselyn has had her business for five years. Each month, Roselyn earns approximately 2,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase more stock for the grocery store. 

Roselyn has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for one year. In the future, Roselyn hopes to expand her business and have a savings deposit for her children's future education.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her grocery store

loans.name: Gary Group

texts.en:
Gary is a farmer and grows rice crops to earn a living. He is married with two children. Gary is 35 years old and lives in Tonggo, Tudela. Gary has been farming rice for five years. He has requested a loan of 6,000 Philippine pesos to purchase additional fertilizer for planting crops. In the future, Gary hopes to send his children to school.

Gary has been a member of PMPC for one year. He is the leader of a four person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizer for planting crops

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 57 years old and lives in Looc, Maria, Siquijor. She is married with three adult-age children.

Lorna sells Ready- to-Wear products (clothing) and displays them during market day in her town. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 2,000 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan amounting to PHP 5,000 for working capitalization of her existing business. 

Lorna has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for one month.  In the future, Lorna hopes to sustain her business and be able to purchase more stock to display.

loans.use: To buy RTW (ready to wear) clothing to sell

loans.name: Sweet Honey Group

texts.en:
Joy is the leader of a two-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

Joy is 29 years old and lives in Kalasan, Pagadian City. She is married with two children.

To earn a living, Joy has a business selling a variety of food. She earns about 5,000 PHP a month doing this type of work. Joy has a requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business.

Joy has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for five years. In the future, Joy would like to have her own carenderia.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business

loans.name: Harmony Center Group

texts.en:
Glady Scan is married with two children. Glady Scan is 32 years old and lives in Napolan, Pagadian City, Philippines.

Glady Scan sells Ready-to-Wear clothes to earn a living and has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more stock of Ready-to-Wear clothes for her business.

Glady Scan has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Glady Scan hopes to become a wholesaler
.
Glady Scan is the leader of a two-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Dios Verdadero 1 & 3 Group

texts.en: Mary is the coordinator of her group Dios Verdadero (True God) 1 & 3. This group, in which most of the members are Haitian, lives in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and the sugar cane industry. Mary makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their five children. Mary is excited to be taking her ninth loan with Esperanza. She has a clothing sales business; she sells all kind of clothes, for women, men and kids. With this loan, she will invest in her business by increasing her inventory, buying jeans, pants, shirts, skirts, t-shirts and other items. Mary's long-term goal is to have a successful business and to build her own house. Now she is living in a batey (a sugar-cane company town) and she is very interested in moving to a more affordable community. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy clothes to increase her inventory.

loans.name: Dios Verdadero 2 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Juana is one of the members of the Group Dios Verdadero 2 & 4 (True God). This group located in the city of San Pedro de Macoris. Juana sells silver and gold jewelry. This is the ninth loan she has requested from Esperanza, and she is planning to purchase more jewelry to expand her business inventory. She is very excited about these loans, which made it possible to start her business almost five years ago, and she is still running it and expanding her sales into more products and clients.

Juana tells us that her challenge is to have a sustainable business, and to be able to provide for her four children and to help her long-term partner with extra income. Her business profits will be used to reinvest in her business. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy silver and gold jewelry.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 58 years old and lives in Rizal, Jimenez. She is married with two children.
 
Leonila has a manufacturing business and earns approximately 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase raw materials for her coffee and cacao manufacturing business. 
 
Leonila has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Leonila hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for her coffee and cacao manufacturing business.

loans.name: El Samaritano Group

texts.en: Dominga plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying vegetables and fruits. She has had her business for six years, starting after the first loan she received from Esperanza. Her group is located in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area. She makes her home here in a simple house with her long-time partner and five of the eight children they have. She says that her most difficult challenge is to raise her children. In the meantime, she enjoys doing business. She plans to continue to enjoy work most of the time. She is dreaming of seeing her children become professional and good people. Dominga is excited to be taking out her 12th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She will save her profits to reinvest in her business. Dominga is the coordinator of her group El Samaritano ("The Samaritan").

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Djumakish

texts.ru: Джумакиш 50 лет, замужем, воспитала троих детей.  Джумакиш занимается откормом и перепродажей скота.  Начатое еще в 1996 году с суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство,  и насчитывающее одну дойную корову и пять овец, сегодня приносит около 6,500 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Джумакиш обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от кредита Джумакиш планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашние скотины.
texts.en: Djumakish is 50 years old, married, and has raised three children. She is engaged in livestock fattening and resale. The farm, which started with the sum of 5,000 som (KGS) back in 1996, today counts one dairy cow and five sheep and brings in around 6,500 som (KGS) per month from the sale of dairy and meat products. In order to further increase the livestock numbers, Djumakish sought help from Bai Tushum & Partners and asked for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS). Djumakish is planning on investing the earnings from the loan into further increase of the number of domestic animals.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mary Jean

texts.en:
To earn a living, Mary Jean has a general store business. She has had this business for two years. Each month, she earns approximately 5,000 Philippine pesos. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store. 

Mary Jean has been a member of PMPC for one year. She is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. Mary Jean is married with two children.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: El Sol 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Marie is one of the members of the Group El Sol 1, 2 & 3 (The Sun), they are located in the city of San Pedro de Macoris. This group is located in one of the rural areas called "batey", populated by Haitian immigrants who came to the country to work in the sugar field plantations. Most of the members in this group are Haitian citizens.

Marie has a cafeteria where she sells juices, sandwiches and snack foods. With this loan, she is planning to invest in her inventory and have more products to meet demand. Marie is very excited to receive her first loan from Esperanza International and proud to be part of this group together with others members to do business and to change their life.


Marie enjoys being at home with her four children; she is a single mother. She has being doing business specially because she need to help her children and provide for her family. She thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy snacks, bread, cheese, jam and juice.

loans.name: Madre De Familia 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Berthe is a Haitian citizen. She is one of the members of the Group Madre de Familia (Mother of a Family), located in the city of San Pedro de Macoris. They live in one of the rural areas called "batey", populated by Haitian immigrants who came to the country to work in the sugar field plantations. Most of the members in this group are Haitian citizens.

Berthe is running a fried food stall in front of her house, where she sells fried chicken, plantains, empanadas and other popular Dominican fried food, specially for dinner. This loan will be invested to purchase goods to prepare the food to sell. This is Berthe's first loan with Esperanza, and she is excited to invest all the money in her business, which she started two years ago with some savings after she became a single mother of three.

She joined the group because she was needing capital to invest in her business. She thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy chicken, plantains, cooking oil, flour, etc.

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama is a 27-year-old man. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. His education background is up to secondary. 

He started his business by opening an office supplies store which provided good services for customers. In addition, he has purchased a document printer He is totally dependent on the income from this business to feed his family and to cover their living expenses. Most of his clients are students so he behaves with them as his children and works hard to provide them with all their requirements.

Recently, Osama`s business has faced a financial challenge leading to a decrease in his profit and he has had to stop providing all people's requirements because of the current bad situation which Yemen has been facing.

Osama is requesting a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to expand and purchase goods for his business so that he can again make students happy by providing  their supplies.

In the future, he hopes to buy another shop to sell stationery and buy a car.

loans.use: to expand and purchase stationery supplies for his business.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is 36 years old, married and has three children.  She runs a tailoring business to earn a living.  She has been in the business for five years.  She also sells clothes to earn extra income.  

Through Faulu Kenya, she has improved her business.  She thanks Faulu Kenya for their financial support.

Francisca hopes to expand her business into wholesale in the future.  She has requested a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy fabric and thread.

loans.use: To buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en: Leah is 24 years old, married and has a two-year-old child.  To earn a living, she runs a bookshop.  She started the business four years ago.  She has employed one person in the business.  Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has gained a lot of knowledge on business. This is because she has been trained on business management skills. She has requested a loan of 60,000 Kenya shillings to buy more books.

loans.use: To buy more books

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 38 years old, married and has two children. She sells sand, ballast and cement.  She has been in the business for six years.  She has employed four people in the business.  She also runs a cafeteria for more income generation.

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has grown her business and become more financially stable.  She has requested a loan to buy sand, ballast and cement.

loans.use: To buy sand, ballast and cement

loans.name: Gabriella

texts.ru:
Габриэлла замужем. Ее супруга зовут Василий.  Уже семь лет, как Габриэлла имеет свой бизнес.

Габриэлла продает  продукты питания. У нее хорошее расположение торговой точки на центральном рынке города. Также у Габриеллы большой ассортимент товара. Габриэлле нравится ее работа. Она настойчивая, трудолюбивая и целеустремленная.  Бизнес цель Габриэллы: открыть еще одну торговую точку.

Габриэлла просит предоставить ей кредит на сумму 10,000 гривен на закупку дополнительного товара. Кредит поможет ей увеличить торговый оборот и соответствено доход своей семьи.
texts.en:
Gabriella is married. Her husband's name is Vasily. Gabriella has been running her own business for seven years. She sells foodstuffs. She owns an outlet, which is conveniently located in the central market of the city. 
Gabriella has a great choice of foodstuffs. She likes her job. Gabriella is a persistent, hard-working and goal-oriented woman. Her business objective is to open one more outlet.
Gabriella is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 hryvnia to buy more foodstuffs. The loan will help Gabriella to increase the trading turnover and, hence, the income of her family.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ice cream to sell

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 48 years old, married, and has three children.  To earn a living, she does dairy farming.  She has been in the business for three years.  She  also sells vegetables to earn extra income.  Through Faulu Kenya, she has improved her business because of their financial support.  

Catherine hopes to practice large-scale farming in the future.  She has requested a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru:
Елена хочет закупить весенний товар - платья - сейас, когда есть большой выбор и можно купить по хорошей цене.
Прошлый кредит Елена использовала также на пополнение ассортимента сезонного товара.

Елена - уверенный в себе человек, способная заражать других оптимизмом даже в самых трудных ситауция. В свободное время она занимается плаваньем сама и учит других.
texts.en:
Elena would like to purchase spring clothing (dresses) now since prices are lower, and there is a wide selection of clothes to choose from.   
Elena used the previous loan to expand the seasonal assortment as well. 

She is a dignified person who is able to convey her own optimism to other people even in the most difficult situations. In her spare time, Elena likes swimming and teaching others to swim.

loans.use: to purchase spring clothing while prices are good

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 59 years old, married, and has three children.  He runs a shop to earn a living.  Besides that, he has a tailoring business which his wife helps in running.  He also does farming for more income generation.  Through Faulu Kenya, he has learnt how to save his money.  This has helped him to invest in his businesses.
